digitalFiat.question: Fiat wa digito kya ki
digitalFiat.text:
Fiat wa digito kika kya ssente ekibeerawo mu ngeri ya digito yokka, nga ku kompyuta oba essimu. Kiba kifaananyi kya digito eky‚Äôensimbi enkalu ezirabika, gamba nga ssente z‚Äôempapula oba ssente.

Fiat wa digito yasoboka olw‚Äôokusaasaana kw‚Äôemikutu gy‚Äôempuliziganya egya digito, nga yintaneeti, n‚Äôokukula kw‚Äôebyuma ebikozesebwa nga kompyuta n‚Äôamasimu ebisobola okuyungibwa ku mikutu gino. Enkola z‚Äôokusasula ezituufu, nga zino ze ngeri eziteereddwawo ez‚Äôokusasula ku yintaneeti, nazo zaakoze kinene mu kujja kwa digital fiat.

Fiat wa digito yeeyongera okudda mu kifo kya fiat akwatibwaako olw‚Äôebisale byayo ebitono, emisinde egy‚Äôamangu, n‚Äôobusobozi obweyongedde obw‚Äôokulondoola. Mu ngeri endala, kya buseere era kyangu okukozesa fiat wa digito era kyangu okulondoola emirimu egikolebwa ne fiat wa digito.
digitalFiat.title: Fiat wa Digito

answers: Ekika kya kaadi y‚Äôokusasula esobozesa abantu okwewola ssente okusasula ebintu
Kaadi egaba oyo alina obuyinza obw‚Äôenjawulo, ng‚Äôobusobozi bw‚Äôokubuuka
Kaadi esobozesa abantu okusasula ebintu nga bawanika omukono ku sensa
feedback: Kituufu. Kaadi y‚Äôokuwola kika kya kaadi y‚Äôokusasula esobozesa abantu okwewola ssente okuva mu kkampuni ya kaadi z‚Äôokuwola okusasula ebintu kati, okusinga okutereka ssente okusasula ebintu oluvannyuma. Waliwo kaadi z‚Äôokuwola ssente nga obuwumbi busatu ezikozesebwa okwetoloola ensi yonna leero
Si ddala, naye kaadi y‚Äôokuwola egaba amaanyi ag‚Äôenjawulo ng‚Äôobusobozi bw‚Äôokubuuka ewulikika ng‚Äôeyinza okuba ey‚Äôessanyu ennyo
Nedda, naye kaadi y'okwewola esobozesa abantu okusasula ebintu nga bawanika omukono ku sensa ewulikika ng‚Äôekintu ekivudde mu firimu ya sayansi ey'okuyiiya, so si bulamu bwa ddala.
plasticCredit.question: Kaadi y'okwewola kye ki?
plasticCredit.text:
Kaadi y‚Äôokuwola kika kya kaadi y‚Äôokusasula esobozesa abantu okwewola ssente okusasula ebintu. Abantu bwe bakozesa kaadi z‚Äôokuwola, baba beewola ssente okuva mu kkampuni ya kaadi z‚Äôokuwola ssente okusasula ebintu kati, okusinga okutereka ssente okusasula ebintu oluvannyuma.

Kino kizze kifuula ekikolwa ky‚Äôokwewola okusobola okukozesa, ekintu ekikwata ku budde abakozesa bwe baagala. Mu kifo ky‚Äôokulinda okutereka ssente, okuyiiya kaadi z‚Äôokuwola kifudde abantu okwewola ssente okugula ebintu bye baagala amangu ago

Leero, waliwo kaadi z‚Äôokuwola ssente nga obuwumbi busatu ezikozesebwa okwetooloola ensi yonna.
plasticCredit.title: Ebbanja ly'obuveera

answers: Obusobozi okulaba nti yuniti ya ssente emu eya digito tesobola kusaasaanyizibwa mirundi egisukka mu gumu nnannyini zo
Okwagala okutondawo ssente ya digito eyali esobola okusaasaanyizibwa ku Mars yokka
Ekirowoozo ky‚Äôokusasula obwesimbu n‚Äôokufuula obutali bwesimbu okuba obw‚Äôebbeeyi ennyo
feedback: Omulimo omulungi. Mu nsi ya digito, nga kyangu okukoppa ebintu, kikulu okukakasa nti ssente za digito ze zimu (ng'ensimbi za digito) tezisobola kukozesebwa nnannyini zo emirundi egisukka mu gumu. Kino kye kyali ekisinga obukulu mu kutondebwa kwa Bitcoin, kubanga kikulu nnyo ku nkola ya ssente ekola nga tewali buyinza bwa wakati (nga gavumenti)
Si ddala, naye ssente za digito eziyinza okukozesebwa ku Mars yokka ziwulikika ng‚Äôeyinza okuba engeri ey‚Äôessanyu ey‚Äôokuwagira okufuga ensi emmyufu

Nedda, naye ekirowoozo ky‚Äôokusasula obwesimbu n‚Äôokufuula obutali bwesimbu okuba obw‚Äôebbeeyi ennyo nsonga nkulu mu kutondawo enkola yonna ey‚Äôensimbi, kuba eyamba okulaba ng‚Äôabeetabye mu kutendekebwa kwesigagana n‚Äôokukolagana.
doubleSpendProblem.question: Kiki ekyali ensonga enkulu mu kutondebwawo kwa Bitcoin
doubleSpendProblem.text:
Mu nsi ya digito, kyangu okukoppa ebintu, n‚Äôolwekyo kikulu okukakasa nti yuniti ya digito y‚Äôemu eya ssente tesobola kusaasaanyizibwa mirundi egisukka mu gumu nnannyini zo.

Mu nkola y‚Äôensimbi erimu ekitongole kya wakati (nga gavumenti), ekizibu kino kigonjoolwa mu ngeri etali ya maanyi nga bakuuma ekitabo ky‚Äôenkolagana ekiddukanyizibwa ekitongole kya wakati. Naye kino mu budde obutuufu kitegeeza ensonga emu ey‚Äôokulemererwa okuva mu ndowooza zombi ez‚Äôokubeerawo n‚Äôokwesiga.

Mu nkola ey‚Äôokugabanya obuyinza, ekizibu ky‚Äôokusaasaanya ssente emirundi ebiri kizibu nnyo okugonjoola. Abantu bangi bagezezzaako okutondawo ssente za digito ezitafugibwa gavumenti, naye bonna babadde n‚Äôokusoomoozebwa kwabwe okw‚Äôenjawulo.

Satoshi Nakamoto eby‚Äôokuyiga bino byonna yabitwala mu nkola era ye yasooka okugonjoola ekizibu ky‚Äôokusaasaanya ssente emirundi ebiri n‚Äôokussa mu nkola Bitcoin ng‚Äôakola enkola ey‚Äôokugabanya obuyinza esasula obwesimbu era ekifuula eky‚Äôebbeeyi ennyo obutaba mwesimbu.
doubleSpendProblem.title: Ekizibu Ky'okusaasaanya Ssente Emirundi Ebiri

answers: Ekizibu ky'okusaasaanya ssente emirundi ebiri
Ekizibu ky'okukwatagana emirundi ebiri kw'ebyo bye baagala
Ekizibu ky'okukendeeza ku kitundu
feedback: Omulimu omulungi. Bitcoin ekozesa enkola y‚Äôokukkaanya ku bukakafu bw‚Äôomulimu nga emirimu giku≈ã≈ãaanyizibwa mu bulooka ne gisibirwa wamu ku bbulooka. Mu ngeri eno, buli mukozesa amanya nti buli ssente esaasaanyizibwa omulundi gumu gwokka
Si ddala. Okukwatagana emirundi ebiri kw‚Äôokwagala kizibu kya kuwanyisiganya ssente ekiyinza okugonjoolwa ne ssente. Gezaako nate
Hah nedda. Okukendeeza ku kitundu mu bitcoin si kizibu, wabula kitundu ku kigonjoola Satoshi gye kyeyakola! Ebisingawo ku ekyo mu Ssuula 302. Gezaako nate!
satoshisBreakthrough.question: Obuzibu ki Satoshi bwe yali alina okugonjoola okusobola okukola Bitcoin
satoshisBreakthrough.text:
Eky‚Äôokugonjoola ekizibu kya Satoshi eky‚Äôokusaasaanya ssente emirundi ebiri kyali kizibu nnyo mu sayansi wa kompyuta n‚Äôenkola ezisaasaanyizibwa. Okutuusa ku Bitcoin, bangi baali balowooza nti tegenda kugonjoolwa.

Eky‚Äôokugonjoola ensonga eno kyasobozesa Satoshi okukola enkola empya ey‚Äôokukozesa ssente mu byuma bikalimagezi eyasobozesa abantu okuweereza ssente za digito butereevu eri buli omu, nga tekyetaagisa bbanka oba ekitongole ekirala okuyamba.
satoshisBreakthrough.title: Satoshi Okutuuka ku buwanguzi

answers: Ssente za fiat eza digito zeesigamiziddwa ku kintu okuva mu mulembe gw‚Äôamakolero, ate Bitcoin ssente ezizimbibwa n‚Äôekigendererwa eky‚Äôomulembe gwa digito
Ssente za fiat eza digito zikozesebwa omuntu yenna, ate Bitcoin nkola nzigale
Ssente za digital fiat zikoleddwa okweyongera mu muwendo okumala ekiseera, ate Bitcoin ekoleddwa okufiirwa omuwendo
feedback: kulwo mulembe gwa digito
Kirabika ebintu wabitabula. Mu butuufu kiri mu ngeri endala. Gezaako nate

Bambi, ekyo si kituufu nnyo. Bitcoin eyolekedde okweyongera mu muwendo okumala ekiseera olw‚Äôokugiwa okukakafu n‚Äôobwetaavu obweyongera, ate ng‚Äôebbeeyi y‚Äôebintu ekendeeza ku muwendo gwa ssente za fiat mu ngeri eyesigika ennyo.
nativelyDigital.question: Njawulo ki enkulu eriwo wakati wa ssente za fiat eza digito ne Bitcoin
nativelyDigital.text:
Ssente za fiat eza ye nkola eya digito n‚Äôekintu ekyakolebwa ku mulembe gw‚Äôamakolero. Byonna birina ebizibu n‚Äôobuzibu bwe bumu n‚Äôekintu ekyasooka. Enkola enzigale efugibwa ennyo era nga ekoleddwa okufiirwa omuwendo okumala ekiseera.

Bitcoin kika kya ssente za digito ezaakolebwa mu ngeri ey‚Äôenjawulo ku mulembe gwa digito. Kisobola okulongoosebwa n‚Äôokulongoosebwa, era omuntu yenna asobola okulaba n‚Äôokukyusa koodi gye yeesigamiziddwa. Kiganyulwa mu birowoozo n‚Äôobuyiiya bw‚Äôomuntu yenna akikola.
nativelyDigital.title: Ekigendererwa ekyazimbibwa olw'omulembe gwa digito

answers: Okuwa obusobozi bw‚Äôokulondoola n‚Äôokusengejja eri oyo agabaOkuwa obusobozi bw‚Äôokulondoola n‚Äôokusengejja eri oyo agaba
Okuvuganya ne Bitcoin nga etterekero ely‚Äôomuwendo
Okutondawo ssente za digito ezisaasaanyizibwa era ezitalina lukusa
feedback: Ekyo kituufu! CBDCs ziringa Mwannyinaze Omukulu owa ssente za digito, ezikoleddwa okuwa obusobozi bw‚Äôokulondoola n‚Äôokusengejja eri oyo azifulumya. Kitiisa, naye nga kituufu

Haha, bambi naye nedda. Wadde nga Bitcoin ne CBDCs zombi ssente za digito, zirina ebigendererwa n‚Äôengeri za njawulo nnyo. CBDCs zifulumizibwa era ne ziwagirwa bbanka enkulu, ate Bitcoin efugibwa gavumenti oba ekitongole kyonna eky‚Äôebyensimbi

Oh mulenzi, ekyo kiddamu kya kuyiiya naye ebyembi si kituufu nnyo. CBDCs tezikoleddwa kuba za kufugibbwa kitongole oba nga tezirina lukusa nga Bitcoin. Mu butuufu, zifulumizibwa era ne ziwagirwa bbanka enkulu, era ekigendererwa kyazo ekikulu kwe kubeera ekintu ekisembayo eky‚Äôokufuga mu mulembe gwa digito. Omukisa omulungi omulundi oguddako!
CBDCs.question: Kigendererwa ki ekikulu eky‚Äôensimbi za bbanka enkulu eza digito (CBDCs) .
CBDCs.text:
Ssente za bbanka enkulu eza digito (CBDCs) ze nkola za digito ez‚Äôensimbi ez‚Äôennono ezifulumizibwa era nga ziwagirwa bbanka enkulu.

CBDCs tezisaasaanyizibwa oba tezirina lukusa nga Bitcoin, era mu kifo ky‚Äôekyo zigendereddwamu okuvuganya n‚Äôengeri endala ez‚Äôokusasula mu ngeri ya digito olw‚Äôokufuga akatale.

Emu ku nsonga enkulu lwaki CBDCs zikulaakulanye kwe busobozi bw‚Äôokulondoola n‚Äôokusengejja bwe ziwa oyo azigaba.

Okugatta ku ekyo, mu mulembe gw‚Äôamagoba amatuufu amabi (nga omuwendo gw‚Äôebbeeyi y‚Äôebintu gusinga amagoba), okwettanira ennyo CBDCs kutera okugenda wamu n‚Äôokuggyawo ssente enkalu ezirabika mu mitendera, ekiyinza okuvaako omuwendo gw‚Äôensimbi okukendeera mu ngeri entuufu.
CBDCs.title: Ssente za Digital eza Banka Enkulu

answers: Obwesige obwetaagisa okusobola okukola
Langi y'ebisale ebirabika
Eky‚Äôokuba nti kyetaagisa okutereka mu ngeri ekwatibwaako
feedback: Okifunye bulungi! Ekizibu ekikulu ekiri mu ssente eza bulijjo bwe bwesige obwetaagisa okusobola okuzikola. Ensonga ya njawulo, anti okwesiga kintu kikulu nnyo mu nkola yonna ey‚Äôensimbi
Ekyotwala ekisesa, naye ebyembi si kyakuddamu kituufu. Ssente eza bulijjo tezikwata ku bulungibwansi bwa ngeri yaayo ey‚Äôomubiri yokka, wadde nga nkakasa nti abantu abamu bayinza okukaayana ekirala
Haha, wadde nga kiyinza obutaba kyangu okusitula waleti ejjudde ssente enkalu, ekyo si kye kizibu ekikolo ku ssente eza bulijjo. Naye teweeraliikiriranga, osobola okuddamu okugezaako!
rootProblem.question: Kiki ekikolo ekizibu ku ssente eza bulijjo okusinziira ku Satoshi Nakamoto
rootProblem.text:
Kati olwo kiki ekyakubiriza okukola Bitcoin? Mu kulangirira pulojekiti eno, Satoshi Nakamoto yannyonnyola bino wammanga:

"Ekizibu ky'emirandira gya ssente eza bulijjo kwe kwesiga kwonna okwetaagisa okusobola okukola. Bbanka enkulu eteekwa okuba nga yeesigika obutayonoona ssente, naye ebyafaayo bya ssente za Fiat bijjudde okumenya obwesige obwo. Bbanka zirina okubeera n'obwesige okukwata ssente zaffe n'okuzitambuza ku kompyuta, kyokka nga baziwola mu mawuggwe g'ebibanja nga n'ekitundu kitono nnyo kye balina okutereka."
rootProblem.title: Ekizibu Ky'ekikolo

answers: Omukozi wa pulogulaamu atamanyiddwa eyakozesa erinnya ery'obulimba "Satoshi Nakamoto".
Craig Wright
Elon Musk
feedback: Kituufu! Kye kyama ekinyuvu, naye kirungi okumanya nti enkola ya bitcoin yeesigamiziddwa ku code asobola ofunibwa omuntu yenna, ekitegeeza nti omuntu yenna asobola okugyekenneenya. Obwerufu buno bugifuula code esinga okwekenneenya mu kubeerawo. Wadde nga kyama ky‚Äôomutonzi waayo, bitcoin yennyini mutimbagano gwa ssente muggule era mwerufu ogusobola okwekebejjebwa n‚Äôokukozesebwa omuntu yenna
Nsonyiwa, naye kirabika Craig Wright okwewozaako nti ye mutonzi wa bitcoin kibadde kifuuliddwa bulungi. Omukisa omulungi n'eky'okuddamu ekiddako
Nedda! Ebitone bya Elon Musk biyinza okusinga okutuukagana n‚Äôokukuba emizinga n‚Äôokuzimba mmotoka ez‚Äôamasannyalaze okusinga okutondawo ssente za digito ez‚Äôenkyukakyuka. Gezaako nate!
bitcoinCreator.question: Ani mutonzi wa bitcoin
bitcoinCreator.text:
Omutonzi wa bitcoin, eyakozesa erinnya lya "Satoshi Nakamoto," tamanyiddwa era tewali bigambibwa nti ye yatonda bikakasiddwa. Satoshi yali mu mulimu guno okumala akaseera katono n'abulawo.

Enkola ya bitcoin yeesigamiziddwa ku kiwandiiko ekiyitibwa open source code, ekitegeeza nti buli muntu asobola okukyetegereza. Obutegeeragana buno bufuula amateeka agasinga okwekenneenyezebwa mu bulamu. Wadde nga waliwo ekyama ky'omutonzi waayo, bitcoin yennyini y'enkola ya ssente ey'obwereere era ey'amagezi esobola okukeberebwa n'okukozesebwa omuntu yenna.
bitcoinCreator.title: Omutonzi wa Bitcoin Satoshi Nakamoto

answers: Obwetaavu bw'abantu abalala abeesigika okukola ssente
Obutabeera na ssente ezisobola okukwaatibwaako
Ebbeeyi y'ebintu okweyongera ereeteddwa ab'obuyinza wakati okugaba ebitundu ebirala
feedback: Kyeekyo. Bitcoin tekyetaagisa muntu wa kusatu eyesigika era ekkiriza okukolagana okukolebwa butereevu wakati w‚Äôabantu ssekinnoomu, okuyitibwa peer-to-peer, okusinga okuyita mu kitongole ekikulu oba abatabaganya
Nedda. Ekyo si kye kiri. Gezaako nate

Okulinnyisa ebbeeyi y‚Äôensimbi mu ngeri ey‚Äôekimpatiira okuva mu bafulumya ssente mu kifo ekimu mazima ddala kizibu bitcoin ky‚Äôegonjoola mu ngeri ey‚Äôekikugu, naye waliwo ekizibu ekisingako omusingi Satoshi kye yakolako. Gezaako nate!
fiatRequiresTrust.question: Ensonga ki enkulu Satoshi Nakamoto gye yagenderera okukolako n‚Äôokutondawo bitcoin
fiatRequiresTrust.text:
Enkola ya ssente za fiat ezaaliwo oluvannyuma lwa-1971 yeetaaga obwesige ku mitendera gyonna kubanga yeesigamiziddwa ku mabanja ate nga terina ennanga ya bbula. Kuno kw‚Äôogatta okwesiga obusobozi bw‚Äôokusasula amabanja mu biseera eby‚Äôomu maaso, okwesiga bbanka z‚Äôebyobusuubuzi n‚Äôenkulu obutakendeeza ssente, n‚Äôokwesiga obusobozi bwazo okukkiriza okufuna n‚Äôeddembe ly‚Äôokukozesa ssente mu kukola emirimu.

Obwesige buno bubadde bumenyeddwa emirundi mingi, omuli n‚Äôomu kiseera ky‚Äôobuzibu bw‚Äôensimbi mu nsi yonna mu 2008/09. Okusobola okukola ku nsonga eno, Satoshi Nakamoto yagenderera okukola enkola ya ssente eya digito nga tekyetaagisa kwesiga bantu ba kusatu ku nkolagana era nga tesobola kukendeezebwa kitongole kya wakati ekifulumya yuniti endala.
fiatRequiresTrust.title: Ssente za Fiat Zetaaga Kwesiga

answers: Ebiwujjo by‚Äôeby‚Äôobugagga mu butale bwa tterekero n‚Äôeby‚Äôamayumba ebifuna okutereezebwa nga buli luvannyuma lwa myaka kkumi
Okweyongera okw‚Äôamangu mu buganzi bw‚Äôomuziki gwa polka
Okukendeera kw‚Äôomuwendo gw‚Äôabantu abakkiririza mu biramu ebitali bya nsi
feedback: Liso joji! Obuzibu bw‚Äôeby‚Äôobugagga mu butale bwa tterekero n‚Äôebizimbe mazima ddala kye kimu ku bikulu ebiva mu kukuba ssente ezisukkiridde n‚Äôokugaziya ebbanja. Kinajjukirwa nti ebiwujjo bino bitera okuganyula mu ngeri etasaana abo abasinga okubeera okumpi n‚Äôensibuko ya ssente empya, ate abantu ssekinnoomu abafuna ssente entono be batera okusinga okukosebwa ebbeeyi y‚Äôebintu n‚Äôokukulaakulana kw‚Äôebyenfuna n‚Äôokugwa kw‚Äôebyenfuna ebivaamu

Oyo si buwanvu obuli wakati w'ebitundu eby'enjawulo eby'amayengo, naddala ebifo eby'enjawulo entuufu wano! Wadde abamu balowooza nti ssente ennyangu zirina akakwate akabi ku muziki, kino si kye kituufu eky‚Äôokuddamu
Okuteebereza kwo kuvudde mu nsi muno. Wadde nga mazima ddala kinyuma okuteebereza ku kubeerawo kw‚Äôabagwira, tekirina kakwate na biva mu kukuba ssente ezisukkiridde n‚Äôokugaziya ebbanja.
moneyPrinting.question: Kiki ekimu ku bikulu ebiva mu kukuba ssente ezisukkiridde n‚Äôokugaziya ebbanja
moneyPrinting.text:
Okukuba ssente ezisukkiridde n‚Äôokugaziya ebbanja bisobola okuleeta ensonga nnyingi ez‚Äôembeera z‚Äôabantu n‚Äôebyenfuna, omuli ebiwujjo by‚Äôeby‚Äôobugagga mu tterekero n‚Äôobutale bw‚Äôebizimbe ebitera okutereezebwa nga buli luvannyuma lwa myaka kkumi.

Wadde ng‚Äôabo abasinga okumpi n‚Äôensibuko ya ssente empya batera okuganyulwa ennyo mu mitendera gino, abantu ssekinnoomu abafuna ssente entono abatalina bintu bya muwendo era nga beesigamye ku musaala ogwa bulijjo be batera okusinga okukosebwa ebbeeyi y‚Äôebintu n‚Äôokukulaakulana kw‚Äôebyenfuna n‚Äôokugwa kw‚Äôebintu ebitondeddwawo enkola y‚Äôensimbi za fiat.

Ekyokulabirako ekimanyiddwa ennyo ku kino kye kizibu ky‚Äôebyensimbi mu nsi yonna ekyatandika mu 2008, ekyakulemberwa okuku≈ã≈ãaanyizibwa okw‚Äôamaanyi okw‚Äôamabanja n‚Äôakabi mu kitongole kya bbanka z‚Äôebyobusuubuzi.
moneyPrinting.title: Okukola Ssente n'oKugaziya Ssente

answers: Okuddiza obuyinza bw‚Äôebyensimbi okuva mu bakulu mu by‚Äôensimbi, okuwa abantu ba bulijjo omukisa okwetaba mu nkola y‚Äôebyensimbi egabanyiziddwa
Okutondawo enkola ya ssente eya digito eyinza okwanguyirwa okunyoomebwa ekitongole kya wakati
Okukwanguyiza abantu ab‚Äôokusatu okwanguyiza okuwaanyisa
feedback: Ekyo kituufu ddala. Twaala okutebereza akwadala kwabo abakulu mu by‚Äôensimbi kye balowooza ku bitcoin
Nedda, obusiru. Ekyo twakifuna dda ne fiat. Ddamu ogezeeko olowooze ku bubaka bwa Satoshi mu Bulooka Eyasooka nga tonnaba kuddamu

Bambi, ekyo si kituufu nnyo. Wadde ng‚Äôabantu ab‚Äôokusatu basobola okuba ab‚Äôomugaso mu kwanguyiza emirimu, okwesiga abatakaanya bano y‚Äôemu ku nsonga Satoshi Nakamoto ze yagenderera okukolako ng‚Äôatondawo Bitcoin. Mpozzi ddamu ogezeeko n‚Äôeky‚Äôokuddamu eky‚Äôenjawulo.
genesisBlock.question: Lwaki Satoshi Nakamoto yatonda Bitcoin
genesisBlock.text:
Kyeyoleka bulungi lwaki Satoshi Nakamoto yatonda Bitcoin bwe twekenneenya bbulooka esooka eya Bitcoin blockchain, eyitibwa bulooka eya sooka.

Bbulooka eno yatondebwawo Satoshi bwe yatongoza Bitcoin mu 2009 era nga mulimu n‚Äôokujuliza bbanka ezaafuna okununulibwa oluvannyuma lw‚Äôobuzibu bw‚Äôensimbi mu nsi yonna obwaliwo mu 2008/09.

"The Times 03/Jan/2009 Chancellor ali ku bunkenke bw'okununula bbanka omulundi ogw'okubiri".

Obuzibu buno, obwesige mu nkola z‚Äôebyensimbi ez‚Äôennono mwe bwayonoonebwa ennyo, bwaleetera Satoshi okukola enkola ya ssente eya digito nga tekyetaagisa kwesiga bantu ba kusatu ku nkolagana era nga tesobola kukendeezebwa kitongole kya wakati ekifulumya yuniti endala.
genesisBlock.title: Bulooka Esookerwako

answers: Aba Cypherpunks kibiina ky'abantu abaagala okukozesa cryptography okutumbula ebyama n'obutebenkevu mu mulembe gwa digito
Aba Cypherpunks kibiina kya ba lumbaganyi abagenderera okubba ebikwata ku muntu n‚Äôamawulire amakulu nga bakozesa enkola ya cryptography
Aba Cypherpunks kibiina kya ba cryptographers abanoonya okukola ensengekera z‚Äôokubala enzibu zibu okugonjoola
feedback: Gyebaleko! Kisanyusa okukimanya nti ekigendererwa kya Cypherpunks eky‚Äôokukozesa enkola ya cryptography okutumbula eby‚Äôekyama n‚Äôobukuumi kikwatagana nnyo mu mulembe gwa digito ogwa leero, ng‚Äôokweyongera okulondoola kuyinza okuvaako eddembe okusaanawo

Bambi, ekyo si kituufu nnyo. Wadde ng‚Äôokukozesa enkola ya cryptography mazima ddala kiyinza okuba eky‚Äôomugaso eri ababbi, aba Cypherpunks banoonya okukozesa cryptography olw‚Äôekigendererwa ekikontana n‚Äôekyo. Mpozzi ddamu ogezeeko n‚Äôeky‚Äôokuddamu eky‚Äôenjawulo
Nedda. Wadde nga cryptography erimu okukozesa ensengekera z‚Äôokubala ezizibu, aba Cypherpunks tebasinga kwagala kutondawo nsengekera zino ku lwabwe. Gezaako nate!
cypherpunks.question: Aba Cypherpunks be baani era ekigendererwa kyabwe kye ki
cypherpunks.text:
Bitcoin kiva mu myaka mingi egy‚Äôokunoonyereza egyakolebwa ekibinja ky‚Äôabantu ssekinnoomu abeeyita Cypherpunks. Bano baagala nnyo okukozesa enkola ya cryptography okutumbula eby‚Äôekyama n‚Äôobukuumi mu nsi nga okweyongera okulondoola mu mulembe gwa digito kuyinza okuvaako eddembe okusaanyizibwawo.

Enkola za ssente za digito ezasooka ezaali zeesigamye ku mikutu gya peer-to-peer (P2P) zaali zirina ekizibu kimu oba byombi ku bino wammanga:

* Baali beetaaga ekitongole kya wakati okuddukanya ekitabo ekikwata ku bwannannyini.
* Yuniti z'ensimbi zaali zisobola okukoppololwa, ekivaamu "ekizibu ky'okusaasaanya emirundi ebiri" nga yuniti emu esobola okusaasaanyizibwa emirundi mingi.

Satoshi yakola ku nsonga zino zombi ng‚Äôagatta tekinologiya aliwo mu kutondawo Bitcoin. Ensonga esooka egonjoolwa kubanga obutonde bw‚Äôomukutu gwa Bitcoin ogw‚Äôokusaasaanyizibwa kitegeeza nti tewali buyinza bwa wakati abakozesa bwe beetaaga okwesiga. Ensonga eyokubiri etunuuliddwa kubanga obukodyo obw‚Äôenjawulo obw‚Äôokuwandiika ebigambo ebikusike obukozesebwa mu Bitcoin bulemesa kukoppa yuniti za ssente.

Y‚Äôengeri y‚Äôokutereka ebitabo mu bitundu ebitali bimu nga tesobola kukyusibwakyusibwa era esobozesa abakozesa okukola n‚Äôokukakasa emirimu nga tekyetaagisa kitongole kya wakati
Nedda Intaneeti mutimbagano gwa kompyuta ezikwatagana mu nsi yonna, naye teyayiiya Satoshi era tegonjoola nsonga za kussa kompyuta mu kifo kimu n‚Äôokusaasaanya emirundi ebiri. Gezaako nate
Omukutu gwa nodes ogusaasaanyiziddwa kitundu kikulu nnyo mu Bitcoin, naye tegugonjoola nsonga za kufugibwa bitongola bwa wakati n‚Äôokusaasaanya emirundi ebiri ku bwagwo. Gezaako nate!
peer2Peer.question: Tekinologiya ki Satoshi gwe yassa mu nkola okugonjoola ensonga z‚Äôokussa ebintu mu kifo ekimu n‚Äôokusaasaanya ssente emirundi ebiri
peer2Peer.text:
Okugonjoola ensonga ezaayogeddwako emabegako ez‚Äôokussa ebintu mu kifo ekimu n‚Äôokusaasaanya ssente emirundi ebiri okusoboka, Satoshi yayiiya eky‚Äôokugonjoola ekyesigamiziddwa ku mutimbagano gw‚Äôennyingo ogusaasaanyiziddwa.

Nodes za kompyuta ezikwatagana buli kiseera. Kino ku bwakyo si kipya. Intaneeti yennyini erina enkola efaananako bwetyo eya nodes eziyungiddwa.

Nodes zonna eza bitcoin, wabula, zitereka kkopi ya ledger y‚Äôemirimu gyonna mu byafaayo by‚Äôomukutu gwa Bitcoin.

Enkola eno empya, etali ya bulijjo ey‚Äôokutereka ebitabo, eyitibwa blockchain, yasooka kuteekebwa mu nkola bulungi mu Bitcoin era egumira nnyo okukyusakyusa.

Ekyo kirowoozo kya nseko, naye nedda, omulimu gwa cryptographic hash mu butuufu gukakasa ekintu ekikontana n‚Äôekyo. Gezaako nate

blockchain.question: Kigendererwa ki eky'omulimu gwa cryptographic hash mu Bitcoin blockchain
blockchain.text:
Bitcoin blockchain ye tterekero egabanyizibwa ekuuma olukalala olukula obutasalako olw‚Äôokutunda kwa Bitcoin okuyitibwa bbulooka.

Bbulooka zisibirwa ku ndala nga ziyita mu kukozesa hashes za cryptographic. Buli bulooka erimu hash ya cryptographic eya block eyasooka, wamu n'obudde ne bwino w‚Äôokutunda. Kino kikola olujegere lwa bulooka nga zonna ziyungiddwa wamu, nga buli bulooka ezimba ku eyo mu maaso gaayo.

Omulimu gwa cryptographic hash gukakasa nti bulooka bw‚Äôemala okugattibwa ku lujegere, tesobola kukyusibwa oba kukyusibwa nga era tekyusizza bulooka zonna eziddako mu lujegere.

Kino kikola likodi eyeeyoleka ey‚Äôokukyusakyusa ey‚Äôokutunda kwonna okubaddewo ku blockchain, eyinza okukozesebwa okukakasa obulungi bwa data eterekeddwa ku lujegere.

Okugiteeka ku mikutu migata bantu kyandibadde ng'okuteeka ebikwata ku kuyingira ku akawunti yo mu bbanka ku yintaneeti - y'engeri enkakafu ey'okubba Bitcoins zo. Kirungi okunywerera ku nkola ez'ennono ezisingako ez'okuwangula omutima gw'omuntu!
privateKey.question: Kigendererwa ki eky'ekisumuluzo eky'obwannannyini mu nkolagana ya Bitcoin
privateKey.text:
Ejjinja eddala ery‚Äôoku nsonda mu Bitcoin ye Public Key Cryptography ekozesa ebisumuluzo bibiri - ekisumuluzo eky‚Äôolukale n‚Äôekisumuluzo eky‚Äôobwannannyini - okussa omukono ku nkolagana n‚Äôokukakasa obwannannyini ku ndagiriro za Bitcoin.

Ekisumuluzo eky‚Äôekyama ye lunyiriri oluwanvu olw‚Äôennukuta ezikozesebwa okukkiriza okukola emirimu gya Bitcoin. Kitera okukiikirira ng‚Äôebigambo 12 ebigatta (oluusi 24). Mu nsengeka entuufu yokka ebigambo mwe bivaamu ekisumuluzo eky‚Äôekyama ekikwatagana.

Oyo yenna amanyi ekisumuluzo eky‚Äôekyama ekya endagiriro ya bitcoin asobola okufuga bitcoin eri mu ndagiriro eyo. N‚Äôolwekyo kikulu okukuumibwa nga kyama era tekigabibwa na muntu yenna. Ekisinga obulungi, erina okuterekebwa nga tegiri ku mutimbagano, waleme kubaawo pulogulaamu eteyetaagisa esobola kugiyingira.

Gabana endagiriro za Bitcoin zokka n‚Äôabasasula okufuna okusasula
Nedda, ekisumuluzo ekikulu eky‚Äôolukale tekikozesebwa kukkiriza kukola nkolagana ya Bitcoin. Ogwo gwe mulimu gw'ekisumuluzo eky'ekyama. Gezaako nate

publicKey.question: Kigendererwa ki eky'ekisumuluzo ekikulu eky'olukale mu Bitcoin
publicKey.text:
Ekisumuluzo ekikulu eky‚Äôolukale mu Bitcoin kisumuluzo ekiggibwa mu ngeri ey‚Äôekyama okuva mu kisumuluzo eky‚Äôobwannannyini ekya Bitcoin era nga kikozesebwa okukola endagiriro za Bitcoin abasasula ze basobola okuweereza Bitcoin.

Kiyinza okukozesebwa okukola endagiriro za Bitcoin ezitaliiko kkomo okuva mu kisumuluzo kimu ekikulu eky‚Äôolukale.

Wadde ng‚Äôekisumuluzo eky‚Äôekyama kikozesebwa okukkiriza emirimu gya Bitcoin n‚Äôolwekyo kyetaaga okukuumibwa nga kya kyama, endagiriro za Bitcoin eziggibwa mu kisumuluzo eky‚Äôolukale zisobola okugabana n‚Äôomusasula okufuna ssente okuva gye bali.

Ebisumuluzo by‚Äôolukale ebikulu bibaamu omutendera omuwanvu ogw‚Äôennamba n‚Äôennukuta era bitandikira ku xpub, ypub oba zpub.

Endagiriro ya Bitcoin ey‚Äôokufuna ssente etandika ne 1, 3 oba bc1.

Ekyo si kye kigendererwa ekikulu eky‚Äôokusima eby‚Äôobugagga. ** Wadde nga kituufu nti abasimi bafuna empeera mu bitcoin olw‚Äôokufuba kwabwe, era balina okusasula amasannyalaze ge bakozesa okukola okubalirira. Gezaako nate

mining.question: Kigendererwa ki ekikulu eky'okusima mu mutimbagano gwa bitcoin
mining.text:
Omukozesa bw‚Äôaba ayagala okusindika okutunda mu mutimbagano gwa bitcoin, yeetaaga okussa omukono ku nkolagana n‚Äôekisumuluzo kye eky‚Äôekyama okukakasa nti ye nnannyini ssente ezikyusibwa. Enkolagana eno bw‚Äôemala okuteekebwako omukono, eweebwa ku mpewo ku mukutu gwa peer-to-peer.

Okusima y‚Äôenkola y‚Äôokugattako emirimu ku bitcoin blockchain. Enkolagana bw‚Äôefulumizibwa ku mutimbagano, esimbulwa abasimi, abakakasa nti enkolagana eyo ntuufu (i.e., omukozesa alina ssente ezeetaagisa era ekisumuluzo eky‚Äôekyama ekikozesebwa okussa omukono ku nkolagana kikwatagana n‚Äôekisumuluzo eky‚Äôolukale ekikwatagana n‚Äôensimbi ).

Enkolagana bw‚Äôemala okukakasibwa, eyongerwa ku bulooka y‚Äôokutunda, wamu ne puzzle y‚Äôokubala. Abasimi bavuganya okugonjoola puzzle, era asooka okugigonjoola afuna okwongera block ku blockchain n‚Äôokwewozaako empeera mu bitcoin. Mu kiseera kino empeera eri ku bitcoins 6.25, nga kw‚Äôogasse ssente zonna ez‚Äôokutunda ezaali mu bbulooka.

Ng‚Äôoggyeeko okwongera emirimu ku blockchain, okusima nakyo kikola okukuuma omukutu gwa bitcoin. Kino kiri bwe kityo kubanga okugonjoola puzzle kyetaagisa amaanyi amangi ag‚Äôokubalirira, era okugattako bulooka ku blockchain kyetaagisa abasimi abalala okukakasa eky‚Äôokugonjoola. Kino kizibuwalira nnyo omuntu yenna oba ekibinja ekimu okukozesa blockchain.

Nedda, kino kyandibadde bukakafu bwa mugabo, nga eno nkola ya njawulo ey‚Äôokukkaanya erimu okulonda omufulumya wa bulooka addako ng‚Äôageraageranye n‚Äôomugabo gwabwe (ensimbi mmeka ze bakwata) mu mutimbagano. Gezaako nate

proofOfWork.question: Omukutu gwa Bitcoin gukola gutya ensibuko y‚Äôamazima wadde nga tegulina buyinza bwa wakati
proofOfWork.text:
Enkola ezisaasaanyizibwa, mu ntegeeza, tezirina nsibuko emu ey‚Äôamazima.

Satoshi kye yatuukako kwe kuzimba enkola esobozesa bonna abeetabye mu kugezesebwa okuziro ku mazima ge gamu nga beetongodde. Obukakafu bw‚Äôomulimu bwe busobozesa kino okubaawo. Ensonga y‚Äôobukakafu bw‚Äôomulimu kwe kutondawo ebyafaayo ebitagambika. Singa ebyafaayo bibiri bivuganya, oyo asinga omulimu oguyingiziddwamu y‚Äôawangula.

Olujegere olusinga okukola ge mazima, mu ntegeeza. Kino kiyitibwa okukkaanya kwa Nakamoto. Kino kikola kubanga omulimu gwetaaga amaanyi. Mu Bitcoin, omulimu kwe kubalirira. Si kika kyonna kya kubalirira, wabula okubalirira okutaliiko kkubo ddene: okuteebereza.

Mu butabeerawo kitongole kya wakati, obukakafu bw‚Äôomulimu bwetaagibwa kubanga bukakasa nti tewali kkubo ddene erigenda mu kwongerako emirimu ku blockchain.

Abasima eby‚Äôobugagga eby‚Äôomu ttaka balina okuvuganya okugonjoola ekizibu kino nga bayita mu kubalirira okw‚Äôamaanyi amakambwe, nga kino mu butonde ky'entebereza, era obukakafu nti omulimu gukoleddwa bufuuka obweyoleka mu biva mu mulimu. Kino kizibuwalira nnyo omuntu yenna oba ekibiina ekimu okukozesa ebyafaayo by‚Äôokutunda.

difficultyAdjustment.question: Kiki ekituuka ku mpeera ya bulooka mu mutimbagano gwa bitcoin buli luvannyuma lwa myaka ena
difficultyAdjustment.text:
Ekintu ekikulu mu nkola ya Bitcoin ye Obuzibu Okutereeza. Algorithm eno ekakasa nti bulooka empya zisangibwa buli luvannyuma lwa ddakiika 10 ku average.

Abasimi bangi bwe beegatta ku mutimbagano guno, obudde obwetaagisa okunoonya bulooka empya bukendeera. Mu mbeera ey‚Äôenjawulo, abasima eby‚Äôobugagga eby‚Äôomu ttaka bwe bava ku mutimbagano, kitwala ekiseera ekiwanvu okwongerako bulooka empya. Enkola y'oBuzibu Okutereeza etereeza obuzibu bwa puzzle y‚Äôokubala okukwatagana n‚Äôenkyukakyuka mu maanyi ga kompyuta ag‚Äôomugatte ag‚Äôabasimi bonna. Kino kiremesa okutondebwawo kwa yuniti za bitcoin eziwera (oba entono) okusinga enteekateeka y‚Äôokugaba eyateekebwawo edda.

Kino kyawukana nnyo ku kusima ebyuma eby‚Äôomuwendo nga zaabu mu ngeri ey‚Äôomubiri ng‚Äôokugattako abasimi ba zaabu abawera kivaako zaabu okubeera omungi n‚Äôolwekyo bbeeyi ye n‚Äôekendeera. Wabula mu Bitcoin, okugattako abasimi abapya kyokka kyongera obukuumi ku mutimbagano.

Bambi, naye empeera ya block tekubisaamu emirundi ebiri buli luvannyuma lwa myaka ena. Olina okuba ng‚Äôotabula Bitcoin n‚Äôebikozesebwa mu ssente za fiat ezigenda zigaziwa buli kiseera ku sipiidi esingako. Gezaako nate

Muyiiya nnyo, naye mukyamu. Enteekateeka y‚Äôokugaba Bitcoin kintu kyonna wabula kya miromyo. Okuteebereza kwayo kuwa obukakafu eri abazannyi b‚Äôebyenfuna obutafaananako kintu kyonna mu byafaayo by‚Äôomuntu. Gezaako nate!
halving.question: Kiki ekituuka ku mpeera ya bulooka mu mutimbagano gwa bitcoin buli luvannyuma lwa myaka ena
halving.text:
Ekintu ekimu ekisembayo ekikulu okutegeera, kiri nti empeera ya bulooka mu mutimbagano gwa bitcoin ekendeezebwako kitundu buli luvannyuma lwa myaka ena, oba buli bulooka 210,000.

Omukolo guno ogumanyiddwa nga "halving", guteekebwa mu pulogulaamu ya bitcoin software abakozesa bonna gye baddukanya. Bitcoin bwe yasooka okutongozebwa, abasima eby‚Äôobugagga eby‚Äôomu ttaka baafuna bitcoins empya 50 ku buli bulooka gye baagatta ku blockchain. Mu kiseera kino, empeera ya block eri bitcoins 6.25, naye egenda kukendeezebwa okutuuka ku bitcoins 3.125 mu 2024 ng‚Äôokusalako ekitundu ekiddako kubaawo.

Okukendeeza ku bitundu bino kugenda kusigala nga kubaawo okutuusa mu mwaka gwa 2140, mu kiseera ekyo omuwendo gwonna ogwa bitcoins ezigenda okuba nga zisimiddwa gujja kukoma ku bukadde 21. We bwazibidde mu mwaka gwa 2023, ebitundu 92% ku bitcoins zonna (\~19.3 million) byasimibwa dda.

Okwawukanako n‚Äôensimbi za fiat, eziyinza okubeera ez‚Äôebbeeyi y‚Äôebintu, bitcoin mu butonde ekendeeza ku bbeeyi y‚Äôebintu. Kino kigifuula ey‚Äôebbula okusinga fiat n‚Äôebyuma eby‚Äôomuwendo nga zaabu ne ffeeza, oba ekintu ekirala kyonna ekimanyiddwa mu bwengula

Kikyaamu! Naye osonyiyibwa, mu butuufu Bitcoin nnyangu nnyo okukozesa. Gezaako nate

bitcoinDrawbacks.question: Kiki ekiyinza okulemesa Bitcoin okukola
bitcoinDrawbacks.text:
Bitcoin, ssente za digito ezisinga okukozesebwa mu nsi yonna era ez‚Äôomuwendo, esobozesa omuntu yenna okusindika omuwendo nga talina mutabaganya eyesigika.

Wabula waliwo ebizibu ebimu mu dizayini ya bitcoin ekulembeza obukuumi n‚Äôokugabanya obuyinza ku muwendo gw‚Äôokulinnyisa.

Enkolagana ezikakasibwa ku bitcoin blockchain zitwala essaawa emu nga tezinnaba kukyusibwa.

Ensasula entonotono, oba okusasula ssente ezitasukka ssente ntono, zikakasibwa mu ngeri etakwatagana, era ebisale bifuula emirimu ng‚Äôezo obutasobola kukolebwa ku mutimbagano leero.

Mu kiseera kino, blockchain ya Bitcoin esobola okukola emirimu nga 3 buli sikonda. Kino okutwalira awamu kirabibwa ng‚Äôekiziyiza Bitcoin okufuuka ssente ekwanguyiza emirimu gya buli lunaku egy‚Äôokutunda obukadde n‚Äôobukadde okwetoloola ensi yonna.
bitcoinDrawbacks.title: Ebizibu ebiri mu Bitcoin

Si ddala. Enjuyi zombi zaali ziwagira mu lujjudde okukuuma obusobozi bw'okuziyiza okukebera, wabula amakampuni mu Bitcoin ecosystem gaali geetegefu okukkiriza ebimu ku bufuzi bw'omulimu oba entegeka mu kuwaanyisiganya obuwanguzi obw‚Äôamangu mu obusobozi bukyusibwe mu sayizi. Gezaako nate

Haha, naye nedda. Wadde nga waliwo amaloboozi agamu agabuusabuusa agasaba okuggyawo obukakafu bw‚Äôomulimu nga bawagira obukakafu bw‚Äôomugabo, kino tekyali kukubaganya birowoozo mu Bitcoin, era tekijja kuba bwe kityo. Gezaako nate.
blocksizeWars.question: Kiki ekyaliwo mu ntalo za Blocksize
blocksizeWars.text:
Obuzibu buno buleetawo okukubaganya ebirowoozo mu bantu ba Bitcoin ku ngeri esingayo obulungi ey'okukulaakulanyamu omukutu gwa Bitcoin, ogutera okuyitibwa entalo z'obunene bwa Bulooka.

Amakampuni mu nkola ya Bitcoin zaawakana nti okwongera ku bunene bwa bulooka, nga kino kye kisinga obunene bwa bulooka ey'okuwaanyisiganya ku blockchain, kijja kusobozesa okutambuza ebintu ebingi okukolebwa buli katikitiki, okufuula omukutu ogwo okuba ogw'omugaso era nga gusobola okukola ku bungi bw'emirimu.

Abakozesa Bitcoin ku ludda olulala olw'okukubaganya ebirowoozo baagambye nti okwongera ku bunene bwa bulooka kijja kuteeka omukutu guno mu kifo ekya wakati, kubanga kyandibadde kyetaagisa kompyuta ez'ebbeeyi era ez'amaanyi okusobola okukola ku bulooka ennene, era kiyinza okuviirako Bitcoin okufuuka ey'okukebera.

Abakozesa mu nkomerero baawangula mu kukuuma obutafugibwa n'okwekenneenya-okuziyiza omukutu gwa Bitcoin era ne balaga nti Bitcoin efugibwa abakozesa, so si kkampuni. Kino era kyali kitegeeza nti okukulaakulanya Bitcoin kyandibadde kyetaagisa eky'enjawulo mubyokukanika eky'okukola okusinga okwongera ku bunene bwa bulooka.
blocksizeWars.title: Entalo z'obunene bwa Bulooka

Yogaayoga! Nga ekintu ekisanyusa, Lightning Network eyambye okwongera okwettanira Bitcoin nga bagikkiriza okukola emirimu mingi buli sikonda n‚Äôokukola ku bungi bw‚Äôokutunda
Si kituufu! Lightning Network mu butuufu ye kingonjoola okupimibwa ezimbiddwa waggulu ku nkola ya Bitcoin. Gezaako nate
Si kituufu! Lightning Network mu butuufu emalawo obwetaavu bwa buli nkolagana okugattibwa ku Bitcoin blockchain, kuba esobozesa okusasula okutono okukolebwa off-chain.
lightningNetwork.question: Omukutu gwa Lightning Network gukola ki
lightningNetwork.text:
Nga abakozesa bawangula era ne bakuuma okugabanya omukutu gwa Bitcoin, eky‚Äôokugonjoola okulinnyisa Bitcoin ekyateesebwako abanoonyereza Tadge Dryja ne Joseph Poon, ekiyitibwa Lightning Network, kyatandika okufuna okusika era kyatongozebwa mu 2017.

Omukutu gwa Laddu, gutera okuyitibwa Lightning oba LN yokka, ye nkola y'okutegerageranya eyazimbibwa waggulu ku nkola ya Bitcoin. Kyanguyiza okusasula okutono, kumpi okw‚Äôamangu wakati w‚Äôabakozesa ku ssente entono ennyo era kimalawo obwetaavu bwa buli nkolagana okugattibwa ku Bitcoin blockchain ate nga kikakasa nti omuwendo ogukolebwa gugoberera amateeka g‚Äôomukutu gwa Bitcoin.

Si kituufu! Ku mutimbagano gwa Bitcoin, emirimu giku≈ã≈ãaanyizibwa mu bulooka ezigattibwa ku blockchain nga buli luvannyuma lwa ddakiika 10. Wabula ku mukutu gwa  Lightning Network, okusasula tekyetaagisa kulinda kukakasa bulooka okutwalibwa ng‚Äôobukuumi. Gezaako nate

Si kituufu! Ku mutimbagano gwa Bitcoin, okusasula kutwalibwa ng‚Äôobukuumi oluvannyuma lw‚Äôokukakasibwa bulooka mukaaga, oba essaawa nga emu. Wabula ku mukutu gwa Lightning, okusasula tekyetaagisa kulinda kukakasa bulooka okutwalibwa ng‚Äôobukuumi.
instantPayments.question: Kitwala bbanga ki okusasula okutwalibwa ng‚Äôobukuumi ku Lightning Network
instantPayments.text:
Mu mutimbagano gwa Bitcoin, emirimu giku≈ã≈ãaanyizibwa wamu mu bulooka, era bulooka empya zongerwa ku blockchain nga buli luvannyuma lwa ddakiika 10. Okusasula bwe kukolebwa nga okozesa Bitcoin, kutwalibwa ng‚Äôobukuumi oluvannyuma lw‚Äôokukakasibwa bulooka mukaaga, oba essaawa nga emu.

Ku Lightning Network, okusasula tekulina kulinda kukakasa bulooka okutwalibwa ng‚Äôobukuumi. Wabula, zibeera za mangu era zimalirizibwa omulundi gumu mu sikonda ntono.

Kino kisobozesa okukozesa Lightning Network okukola emirimu gy‚Äôokutunda, okusasula okuva ku muntu omu, oba embeera endala yonna gy‚Äôolina okusasula mu bwangu.

Nedda*.* Wadde nga enkola z‚Äôebyensimbi ez‚Äôennono ziyinza okwetaaga omuwendo omutono n‚Äôensimbi ezitakyukakyuka ku nsasula, Lightning Network ekkiriza okusobola okusasula entono ennyo awatali bukwakkulizo buno
Si bwe kiri ddala! Wadde nga omukutu gwa Lightning gukkiriza okusobola okusasula micropayment, micropayment tetegeezebwa nga nsasula ekoleddwa nga tukozesa Lightning Network. Gezaako nate!
micropayments.question: Micropayment kye ki
micropayments.text:
Micropayments kitegeeza enkolagana y‚Äôensimbi entono ennyo, emirundi mingi ku ssente ezitasukka ddoola emu. Ebika by‚Äôokusasula bino biyinza okuba ebizibu okukola nga tukozesa enkola z‚Äôebyensimbi ez‚Äôennono, kubanga bitera okuba n‚Äôensimbi entono eziyinza okukyusibwa n‚Äôebisale ebigere ebiyinza okufuula okusasula okutono obutaba kwa mugaso.

Omukutu gwa Lightning Network gukkiriza okusobola okukola micropayments nga okozesa Bitcoin. Kisobozesa abakozesa okusindika ssente entono ennyo eza Bitcoin, okukka ku 1 sat, awatali bulabe bwa kufiirwa buyinza ku nsimbi zaabwe eri omuntu ow'okusatu (ekiyitibwa "custodial risk").

Okwawukanako n‚Äôekyo, Bitcoin blockchain mu kiseera kino erina ssente entono ez‚Äôokutunda n‚Äôebisale ebifuula micropayments obutaba ya mugaso. Lightning Network ekkiriza okusasula okutono okuli mu Bitcoin, nga bakozesa enkolagana entuufu eya Bitcoin. Kino kiggulawo okusobola okutondawo obutale obupya n‚Äôokufuula okusasula okutono okubeera okw‚Äôomugaso.
micropayments.title: Okusasula ssente entonotono

Ekyo si bwe kiri! Wadde ng‚Äôokulongoosa okusikiriza kwa Bitcoin eri bamusigansimbi kuyinza okuba omugaso mu kulongoosa scalability, si y‚Äôensonga enkulu lwaki obusobozi bw'okusibwe mu sayizi kikulu eri omukutu gwa Bitcoin

Gezaako nate! ** Okufuna layisinsi ezeetaagisa okukolagana n‚Äôebitongole by‚Äôebyensimbi kiyinza okuba ekiruubirirwa eri ebibiina ebimu ebikola ne Bitcoin, naye tekikwatagana butereevu na ndowooza ya scalability.
scalability.question: Lwaki obusobozi bw'okusibwe mu sayizi kikulu eri omukutu gwa Bitcoin
scalability.text:
Scalability kitegeeza obusobozi bw‚Äôenkola, gamba ng‚Äôomukutu oba omukutu, okukwata enkozesa oba entambula ennene nga tefunye nsonga oba kukendeera.

Scalability kikulu eri Bitcoin kubanga omukutu gujja kwetaaga okusobola okuwagira omuwendo omunene ennyo ogw‚Äôokutunda okusobola okutuukiriza obwetaavu bw‚Äôokusasula eby‚Äôamaguzi n‚Äôokusasula mu ngeri ey‚Äôobwengula.

Lightning Network esobozesa abakozesa okukola emirimu kumpi egitalina kkomo wakati wa bannaabwe ebweru wa Bitcoin blockchain, oba off-chain.

Kino kitegeeza nti emirimu gisobola okukolebwa nga tekyetaagisa buli emu okuwandiikibwa ku blockchain, ekiyamba okukendeeza ku mugugu ku mutimbagano n‚Äôokugusobozesa okukola emirimu mingi.
scalability.title: Obusobozi okulinnyisibwa

paymentChannels.question: Emikutu gy‚Äôokusasula mu Lightning Network gisobozesa gitya abakozesa okusasula buli omu
paymentChannels.text:
Omukutu gwa Lightning Network gulimu enkumi n‚Äôenkumi z‚Äôemikutu gy‚Äôebibiina ebiri egy‚Äôokusasula ssente.

Oyinza okulowooza ku mukutu gwa Lightning nga okuggulawo tab ku bbaala y‚Äôomu kitundu kyo. Mu kifo ky‚Äôokuggyayo waleti yo n‚Äôosasula buli lw‚Äôolagira eky‚Äôokunywa, kikola amakulu okukekkereza obudde, amaanyi ne ssente ng‚Äôobala ebyokunywa byo byonna awamu ku nkomerero y‚Äôekiro n‚Äôokola okusasula okusembayo mu kusasula omulundi gumu.

Omulabe nagukola mu ngeri y‚Äôemu. Buli lwe wabaawo okusasula okuva ku muntu A okutuuka ku muntu B, bitcoin zisindikibwa okuva ku ludda olumu olw‚Äôomukutu okudda ku lulala. Abakozesa babiri basobola okusasulagana okudda n‚Äôokudda emirundi mingi nga bwe baagala, kumpi mu kaseera ako era nga kumpi tebasasula bisale.

routing.question: Omukutu gwa Laddu gukkiriza gutya abakozesa okusasula bannaabwe singa tebakwatagana butereevu nga bayita mu nkola y'okusasula
routing.text:
Oyinza okuba ng‚Äôolowooza nti okuteekawo omukutu gw‚Äôokusasula nga gulimu ebikumi n‚Äôebikumi bya bizinensi kiyinza okukukooya, naye nedda. Obulungi bw'omukutu gwa Laddu nti mutimbagano gwa mikutu egyatungibwa wamu.

Ka tugambe nti Bob yamatiza mukwano gwe Carol naye okwegatta ku Mukutu gwa Laddu. Alice alina omukutu ne Bob, ate Bob alina omukutu ne Carol. Olwo Alice ne Carol basobola okusasulagana nga bayita mu ‚Äúkuyisa makubo‚Äù nga bayita mu Bob.

Obumu ku bukodyo bukakasa nti Bob tasobola kubba ssente nga zimuyitamu.

Bw‚Äôosasula ku Mukutu gwa Laddu, node yo enoonya ekkubo ly‚Äôemikutu wakati wo n‚Äôekifo w‚Äôogenda. Kino kye kiyitibwa okuyisa amakubo. Kino mazima ddala byonna bikolebwa mu ngeri ya otomatiki n‚Äôennyiriri za Laddu ezikwatibwako, ekisobozesa okubaawo mu kaseera katono.

itsaBubble.question: Ewaanyisiganya ya bitcoin gutuuse gutya ku mutindo okumala ebbanga
itsaBubble.text:
Emyaka bwe gizze giyitawo, bitcoin etera okuyitibwa kiwujjo abantu ab‚Äôenjawulo. Wadde nga bbeeyi yaayo ebadde n‚Äôokukendeera okw‚Äôamaanyi okuwerako okuyinza okuba nga kwe kwaviirako akabonero kano, okutwalira awamu omuze gwa bitcoin gubadde gugenda waggulu buli kiseera.

Abavumirira abazze balangirira okufa kwa bitcoin oluvannyuma lwa buli enkulungo y‚Äôakatale bakakasiddwa nti bakyamu, anti ssente za digito ezitandise okukula wadde nga balagula. Nga abavumirira bano baggwaamu okugeraageranya kwe bayinza okukozesa, kyeyoleka bulungi nti bye balumiriza tebirina musingi.

Nsonyiwa, ekyo si kituufu nnyo. Wadde nga gavumenti okuyingira mu nsonga mazima ddala kuyinza okukosa bbeeyi ya bitcoin, si y‚Äôensonga enkulu ekwata ku kukyukakyuka kwayo

Bambi, ekyo si kituufu. Wadde ng‚Äôomutendera gw‚Äôomwezi guyinza okuba n‚Äôebikosa ebyewuunyisa ku bintu ebimu, tegukola kinene mu kukyukakyuka kw‚Äôomuwendo gw‚Äôensimbi za bitcoin. Sigala ng‚Äôogezaako!
itstooVolatile.question: Kiki ekikulu ekikwata ku kukyukakyuka kw‚Äôomuwendo gw‚Äôensimbi za bitcoin
itstooVolatile.text:
Kiba kya muntu okusuubira nti bitcoin ejja kukuuma emiwendo egy‚Äôenjawulo, anti esuubulibwa essaawa yonna, buli lunaku mu mwaka, okwetoloola ensi yonna. Tewali bisaanyizo bya kwewandiisa, nnaku za bbanka, okumenya circuit, oba okununula mu katale ka bitcoin, akakola ng‚Äôakatale ak‚Äôeddembe ddala.

Okukyukakyuka kwonna era kwonna mu bbeeyi ya bitcoin kuva ku baguzi n‚Äôabatunzi okutuuka ku nzikiriziganya mu kiseera ekituufu awatali kutaataaganyizibwa okuva mu gavumenti. Nga bitcoin egenda mu maaso n‚Äôolugendo lwayo okutuuka ku kufuuka sitoowa y‚Äôomuwendo ey‚Äôensi yonna esookerwako mu mulembe gw‚Äôamawulire, si kya mazima okulowooza nti enkulaakulana yaayo yandibadde ya layini.

Nga okwettanira bitcoin kweyongera, kifuuka kya bulabe nnyo era ebiyinza okulinnya bikendeera, ekivaako okukendeera mu kukyukakyuka.

Ekyo si kituufu nnyo. Wadde ng‚Äôobutono mazima ddala busobola okuyamba ku muwendo gwa ssente, si kye kyokka ekigiwanirira. Gezaako nate

itsnotBacked.question: Kiki kyokka ekiwanirira ssente zonna okusinziira ku Parker Lewis
itsnotBacked.text:
Ekirowoozo kya ssente eziwaniriddwa kikontana, kubanga obuyambi bwennyini olwo bwanditwaliddwa nga ssente. Ekitundu ku muwendo gwa ssente kiva ku butono bwazo. Bitcoin tekyetaagisa kuwagirwa kintu kirala ekitali kya bulijjo kubanga mu butonde ya bbula.

Okukakasibwa era okubalirirwa okuyita mu ngeri ezeetongodde, bitcoin terimu bulabe bwa kibiina kirala. Tewali muntu wa kusatu alina kwesigika okukuuma n‚Äôokukuuma ebintu oba eby‚Äôobugagga. Bwe kiba nga waliwo ekintu kyonna, kisoboka okuba nti ebiseera eby‚Äôomu maaso bijja kuwagirwa bitcoin.

Nga Parker Lewis bwe yagamba nti, "Mu nkomerero, bitcoin ewagirwa ekintu, era kye kintu kyokka ekiwanirira ssente zonna: obwesige bw'ebintu byayo eby'ensimbi."
itsnotBacked.title: Ssente zirina okuba nga ziwaniriddwa ekintu kyonna?

willbecomeObsolete.question: Kisoboka bitcoin okufuuka etaliiko mugaso olunaku lumu
willbecomeObsolete.text:
Bitcoin ekiikirira okuzuula okw‚Äôenjawulo okw‚Äôebbula ery‚Äôenkomeredde, okufaananako n‚Äôokuzuula omuliro, amasannyalaze, oba ekitundu ky‚Äôokubala.

Si kya magezi oba kisoboka okuvuganya ne bitcoin mu nsonga z‚Äôebbula, anti tewali ddaala lya bbula erisinga ku bbula ery‚Äôenkomeredde. Okunenya bitcoin okulowoozebwa nti obuzibu oba obuzibu bulowooza nti tewali kusuubulagana mu nsonga z‚Äôobukuumi n‚Äôokusikiriza dizayini, oba nti enkola ya bitcoin eriwo kati tewa dda migaso gya maanyi eri obukadde n‚Äôobukadde bw‚Äôabakozesa.

Nga omukutu ogukula amangu, ogutaliiko bukwakkulizo nga gukola ebitundu 99.98% mu myaka egisukka mu kkumi, nga gukoze ku buwumbi bwa ddoola mu muwendo era nga gukuumibwa obuwumbi bwa ddoola mu hardware, tekisuubirwa nti bitcoin ejja kusengulwa ng‚Äôomukutu gw‚Äôensimbi ogwa digito ogusinga ku kino okusonga.

Nga Michael Saylor bwe yagamba nti, "Tewabangawo kyakulabirako kya mutimbagano gwa digito ogw'ekisolo kya doola 100B ogwawangulwa oluvannyuma lw'okutuuka mu kifo ekyo ekifuga."

toomuchEnergy.question: bitcoin ekola etya ku nkozesa y'amasannyalaze mu nsi yonna
toomuchEnergy.text:
Bitcoin ssente za digito ezisaasaanyiziddwa era ezituukirirwa abakozesa okwetoloola ensi yonna era nga teziyinza kusengekebwa olw‚Äôenkola yaayo eya Proof of Work.

Nga mu kiseera kino abantu ababalirirwamu obuwumbi buna babeera wansi w‚Äôobufuzi obw‚Äôekibogwe, bitcoin etuwa engeri abantu ssekinnoomu gye bayinza okusindika, okufuna, okutereka, n‚Äôokutambuza obugagga. Kikulu okulowooza ku bungi bw‚Äôamaanyi omukutu gw‚Äôensimbi nga guno gwe gulina okukozesa n‚Äôokwekenneenya n‚Äôobwegendereza ani asinga okubeera n‚Äôebikozesebwa okusalawo ku nsonga eno.

Engeri emu ey‚Äôokulowooza ku ngeri bitcoin gy‚Äôekwata ku nkozesa y‚Äôamasoboza mu nsi yonna kwe kulowooza ku maapu y‚Äôensi yonna, ng‚Äôebisale by‚Äôamasannyalaze mu ggwanga bikiikirira entikko n‚Äôebifo. Okwongera bitcoin mu kutabula kiringa okuyiwa egiraasi y‚Äôamazzi ku maapu - esenga mu biyumba, n‚Äôezigonza. Kino kiri bwe kityo kubanga bitcoin egula amaanyi mu nsi yonna ku bbeeyi egere, ekiyamba okugeraageranya ensaasaanya y‚Äôamaanyi agakozesebwa okwetoloola ensi yonna.

internetDependent.text:
Waliwo akabi, ddala, nti yintaneeti eyinza okubula olw‚Äôebikozesebwa okulemererwa, obutyabaga obw‚Äôobutonde, oba okuvaako mu bugenderevu. Wabula kisoboka okukola emirimu gya bitcoin ng‚Äôokozesa enkola ezitali ku mukutu n‚Äôemikutu emirala egy‚Äôempuliziganya.

Okugeza, enkolagana ya bitcoin eriko omukono esobola okuweebwayo ku node emu n‚Äôeweebwa ku mutimbagano okuteekebwa mu bbulooka abasimi. Waliwo engeri ez‚Äôenjawulo ez‚Äôokukola kino, gamba ng‚Äôokusindika enkolagana ng‚Äôoyita mu bubaka bwa SMS, okukozesa waleti ey‚Äôomubiri ng‚Äôerina ekisumuluzo eky‚Äôekyama ekirabika ng‚Äôokozesa omulundi gumu, oba okufuna bulooka ng‚Äôoyita ku setilayiti. forcrimeOnly.question: Kituufu okugamba nti ebintu bya bitcoin bivuddeko okutwalira awamu okweyongera kw‚Äôebikolwa by‚Äôobumenyi bw‚Äôamateeka
forcrimeOnly.text:
Bitcoin kikozesebwa ekitaliimu ludda mu kuwaanyisiganya omuwendo, era tekirina nzikiriza, ndowooza oba mpisa za butonde. Amakulu gaayo gasalibwawo engeri gye gakozesebwamu. Si kituufu okugamba nti ebintu bya bitcoin bivuddeko okutwalira awamu okweyongera kw‚Äôebikolwa by‚Äôobumenyi bw‚Äôamateeka.

Obumenyi bw‚Äôamateeka tebusibuka mu kufuna bikozesebwa, wabula buva mu mbeera z‚Äôomuntu kinnoomu. Singa bitcoin eba ya mugaso, esobola okukozesebwa omuntu yenna, omuli n‚Äôabamenyi b‚Äôamateeka. Bwe kiba nga tekirina mugaso, tekiyinza kukozesebwa muntu yenna, nga mw‚Äôotwalidde n‚Äôabamenyi b‚Äôamateeka.

Nga Parker Lewis bwe yagamba nti, "Tewali kintu kyonna kya buzaale ku bikozesebwa ebikozesebwa okwanguyiza emisango ekigifuula emisango ku bwabyo. Wadde nga gikozesebwa mu bumenyi bw'amateeka, tewali muntu yenna asaba kuwera nguudo, yintaneeti, mail, n'ebirala."

Okugatta ku ekyo, bitcoin si nteekateeka ya kusiga nsimbi, wabula ngeri ya ssente. Okwawukanako n‚Äôemikisa gy‚Äôokusiga ensimbi egitategeerekeka egiyinza okutumbulwa eri abantu ssekinnoomu abatategedde, koodi ya bitcoin ya nsibuko nzigule era okugiwa esobola okukakasibwa mu bwetwaze ekiseera kyonna.

bitcoinisTooSlow.question: Njawulo ki enkulu wakati w‚Äôokusasula ne credit card n‚Äôokusasula ne bitcoin on-chain
bitcoinisTooSlow.text:
Okusasula ne bitcoin si kye kimu n‚Äôokukozesa credit card okugula. Bw‚Äôokozesa kaadi y‚Äôokuwola, ssente z‚Äôosasula ziyita mu bantu abawera nga tezinnaba kutuuka ku akawunti y‚Äôomusuubuzi mu bbanka oluvannyuma lw‚Äôennaku oba wadde wiiki ng‚Äôokola.

Okwawukanako n‚Äôekyo, bw‚Äôosasula ne bitcoin ku blockchain enkulu, oba osindika ssente entuufu butereevu eri oyo azifuna awatali mutabaganya yenna. Kino kitegeeza nti tewali bulabe bwa kusengejja era okutunda kutwalibwa ng‚Äôokusembayo nga kumaze okukakasibwa bulooka mukaaga ku blockchain.

Okugerageranya okutuufu kwandibadde wakati wa bitcoin base layer ne Fed nga omugabi w'ensimbi era nga asaanyawo enkola.

Okuva omukutu gwa Lightning we gwajja, okunenya "Bitcoin ya mpola" okusinga kusirise.

Wadde nga omuntu yenna asobola okufuka koodi n‚Äôakola enkyukakyuka mu mateeka, tekisuubirwa nti enkyusa eno eya koodi yanditwaliddwa omukutu omugazi. Enkola y‚Äôokukkaanya mu bitundu ebitali bimu n‚Äôokugabibwa kwa bitcoin okutavunda bikulu nnyo mu kusikiriza kwayo ng‚Äôengeri ya ssente.

Omuwendo ogusinga obunene ogwa bitcoin guteekeddwa ku bukadde 21, era okugezaako kwonna okwongera ku kkomo lino kyandibadde kyetaagisa okukkaanya okuva mu kitundu ekinene eky‚Äôomukutu gwa bitcoin, ekintu ekitali kya bulijjo nnyo.

Abantu abamu balowooza nti ebifo ebisima eby‚Äôobugagga, nga bino bibinja by‚Äôabasima eby‚Äôobugagga ebikolagana okwongera ku mikisa gyabwe egy‚Äôokuzuula bbulooka, biyinza okutaataaganya omukutu gwa bitcoin oba okusengejja emirimu.

Nga Jimmy Song bwe yagamba nti, "Obungi bw'amaanyi ga hashing tesobola: kutwala ssente z'olina edda, okukyusa amateeka ga bitcoin, oba okukulumya nga tezerumya."

Naye enzikiriza eno yeesigamiziddwa ku kusosola mu yuniti, kubanga kituufu nnyo okugeraageranya akatale kwonna aka bitcoin ku by‚Äôobugagga ebirala okusinga bbeeyi ya yuniti yokka eya bitcoin emu.

prohibitivelyHigh.question: Ensonga ki enkulu lwaki ssente z‚Äôokutunda ku mitendera enkulu eya bitcoin zisigala nga ntono nnyo bw‚Äôogeraageranya n‚Äôenkola z‚Äôebyensimbi ez‚Äôennono
prohibitivelyHigh.text:
Endowooza endala enkyamu ku bitcoin eri nti ssente zaayo ez‚Äôokutunda ebintu ziwera nnyo.

Wabula, okutunda okukakasibwa ku layeri enkulu eya bitcoin kuwa omutendera gw‚Äôokusembayo ogutaliiko kye gufaanana mu nkola y‚Äôebyensimbi ey‚Äôennono. Wadde nga kituufu nti ssente z‚Äôokutunda ziyinza okulinnya oluusi n‚Äôoluusi olw‚Äôobusobozi obutono obwa buli bulooka, omukutu gwa bitcoin gusigala nga gwe musingi omulungi era ogwesigika ogw‚Äôokusasula emirimu egy‚Äôomuwendo omungi.

Mu butuufu, okusinziira ku Saifedean Ammous, "wakati wa October 2010 ne July 2021, ssente z'okutunda buli lunaku zaatuuka ku bitundu nga 0.02% ku muwendo gw'okutunda."

Okugatta ku ekyo, enkolagana entonotono, omuli n‚Äôenkolagana entonotono, zitera okusengulwa ne zigenda mu layers ez‚Äôokubiri nga okumyansa, amazzi, oba federated side-chains nga ebisale biba wansi nnyo okusinga ebyo ebiweebwa bbanka ez‚Äôamaduuka.

willBeHoarded.question: Okukwata bitcoin kintu kye kimu n'okukung'aanya bitcoin
willBeHoarded.text:
Waliwo endowooza eya bulijjo nti okugaba kwa bitcoin okutakyukakyuka kusikiriza okuku≈ã≈ãaanya, oba ekikolwa ky‚Äôokukwata ku bitcoin okusinga okugisaasaanya mu by‚Äôenfuna.

Kyokka, ensonga eno erina obuzibu obutonotono. Ekisooka, okutereka, oba ekikolwa ky‚Äôokuteeka ssente ku bbali okukozesa mu biseera eby‚Äôomu maaso, kitera okutabula n‚Äôokukung‚Äôaanya. Mu butuufu, okutereka kintu kyetaagisa okusooka okuteeka ssente ennyingi era kiyinza okutunuulirwa ng‚Äôenkola ey‚Äôobuvunaanyizibwa mu by‚Äôensimbi.

Ekyokubiri, okukwata ku bitcoin, oba ssente ez‚Äôengeri yonna, ngeri ya bulijjo ey‚Äôokwekuuma obutali bukakafu mu biseera eby‚Äôomu maaso era tekitegeeza nti tezikozesebwa.

Nga Pierre Rochard bwe yalambika, "bitcoin zonna bulijjo zikuumibwa muntu, okusasula kukyusa ani agikutte yokka." Mu ngeri endala, ekikolwa ky‚Äôokukwata bitcoin kyennyini nkozesa ya bitcoin.

Eky'okuba nti kyangu okufuna ate era n'okikyusa n'okugabana kubanga endabika yaakyo eri abantu bonna kisobozesa enteekateeka y'eggwanga oba entegeka abantu gye batuuka ku buwanguzi oba okubeera n'ebifo eby'amaanyi okusinziira ku busobozi bwabwe n'obuvunaanyizibwa bwabwe, mu kifo ky'obugagga bwabwe oba embeera y'abantu era ekubiriza "Abantu bangi balina ekiroowozo kyekimu ku kye bamanyi" okuzimba eby'okugonjoola

Okugezaako okulungi, naye omugaso gwa bitcoin teguli mu code yaayo yokka wabula n'abantu n'ebikozesebwa ebigyetoolodde. Omukisa omulungi omulundi oguddako

canBeDuplicated.question: Ensonga ki enkulu lwaki bitcoin etwalibwa ng‚Äôey‚Äôomuwendo wadde nga code yaayo esobola okukoppebwa omuntu yenna
canBeDuplicated.text:
Ensonga emu ewakanya omuwendo gwa bitcoin eri nti si bbula kubanga waliwo enkumi n‚Äôenkumi za cryptocurrencies endala ezisangibwawo era kubanga omuntu yenna asobola okukoppa code n‚Äôakola enkola ye.

Wabula kino kibuusa amaaso nti bitcoin esingako ku kitundu kya koodi yokka. Ye nkola ya open source ey‚Äôokutambuza omuwendo esikiriza abantu n‚Äôeby‚Äôobugagga olw‚Äôobwerufu bwayo n‚Äôenkola yaayo enkakali ey‚Äôokukulaakulanya.

Nga @BTCSchellingPt bwe yategeezezza, "okueera nga buli muntu asobola okifuna kyitegeeza kifugibwa bantu nnyo. Ofunye obwongo bw'enjuki obuzimba eby'okungonjoola. Ofuna okwekenneenya okwo kwonna era ekyo kidda mu byokwerinda. Bitcoin Core osanga y'emu ku code bases ezisinga okwekenneenya ennyo mu." ensi."

Mu ngeri endala, omugaso gwa bitcoin teguli mu koodi yaayo yokka, wabula ne mu kitundu n‚Äôebikozesebwa ebigyetoolodde.

scarcity.question: Kiki eky'obugagga eky'ebula
scarcity.text:
Bwe waba tewabaawo bikozesebwa bimala kutambula, abantu n‚Äôebibiina bivuganya ku byo.

Okuvuganya kuno kutera okweyolekera mu bbeeyi y‚Äôebintu n‚Äôobuweereza mu katale ak‚Äôeddembe. Singa obwetaavu bw‚Äôeky‚Äôobugagga ekimu bweyongera mangu okusinga ekiweebwayo, kiyinza okufuuka eky‚Äôebbula era eky‚Äôomuwendo.

Ssente zitera okukozesebwa ng‚Äôengeri y‚Äôokugula ebintu kubanga nnyangu okusuubula ate nga za muwendo kubanga za bbula. Bitcoin ngeri ya ssente ya digito erimu ssente ezitakyukakyuka, ekigifuula etali ya bulijjo era ey‚Äôomuwendo.

Endowooza nti tewali kintu kimala kutambula musingi musingi gwa by‚Äôenfuna, naye kitera okubuusibwa amaaso mu kusalawo kw‚Äôebyobufuzi.

monetaryPremium.question: Omutemwa gw‚Äôensimbi kye ki
monetaryPremium.text:
Singa omuwendo gwa ssente tegusinziira ku bbula lyazo, guyinza obutaba gwesigika ng‚Äôengeri y‚Äôokuterekamu obugagga. Mu mbeera eno, ebintu ebirala ebitono, gamba ng‚Äôeby‚Äôobugagga ebiriwo oba eby‚Äôobugagga eby'okukozesa, biyinza okweyongera okuba eby‚Äôomuwendo ne bikozesebwa ng‚Äôekifo kya ssente.

Omuwendo guno ogw‚Äôokwongerako gumanyiddwa nga omutemwa gw‚Äôensimbi. Engeri ya ssente eya bulijjo bw‚Äôeba tekola bulungi, abantu bayinza okudda ku bintu ebirala ebitatera kubaawo oba ebizibu okufuna ng‚Äôengeri y‚Äôokuwanyisiganya omuwendo.

Ebika by‚Äôensimbi ebimu eby‚Äôebyafaayo tebyalina mugaso mulala oba mugaso gwonna ng‚Äôoggyeeko okukozesebwa ng‚Äôengeri y‚Äôokusuubulamu ebintu ebirala. Enjawulo eriwo wakati w‚Äôomuwendo gw‚Äôekintu nga ssente n‚Äôomuwendo gwakyo olw‚Äôenkozesa yaakyo endala gwe muwendo gw‚Äôensimbi.

greshamsLaw.question: Etteeka lya Gresham kye ki
greshamsLaw.text:
Etteeka lya Gresham ndowooza ennyonnyola engeri abantu gye batera okukozesa ebika by‚Äôensimbi eby‚Äôenjawulo mu ngeri ez‚Äôenjawulo nga zitambula wamu.

Singa ebika by‚Äôensimbi bibiri gavumenti oba ekitongole ekirala biweebwa omuwendo ogw‚Äôenkanankana, naye ng‚Äôemu ekoleddwa mu kintu eky‚Äôomuwendo ennyo, abantu bajja kutereka ssente ezisinga okuba ez‚Äôomuwendo ne basaasaanya ezo ezitali za muwendo nnyo.

Kino kiyinza okubaawo nga gavumenti ekendeeza ku ssente zaayo, oba okuzifuula ez‚Äôomuwendo omutono, ng‚Äôekendeeza ku bungi bw‚Äôebintu eby‚Äôomuwendo bye zirimu. Ekivaamu abantu babulwa obwesige mu ssente ezikendedde ne basinga kwagala kunywerera ku eyo ey‚Äôomuwendo ennyo mu kifo ky‚Äôekyo.

Omusingi guno guyinza n'okukola ku ssente "fiat", ezitawanirirwa kintu kya mubiri nga zaabu oba ffeeza, singa okugabibwa kw'ensimbi eyo kwongera mu ngeri efuula ssente entono.

Mu myaka egiyise, okuvaayo kwa bitcoin nga ssente ya digito kivuddeko omuze gw'abantu okutereka mu bitcoin n'okukozesa ssente zaabwe ez'ekinnansi oba "fiat," mu bwangu. Kino kiri bwe kityo kubanga bitcoin etunuulirwa ng‚Äôerina omuwendo omunene ogw‚Äôekiseera ekiwanvu ate nga nnywevu okusinga ssente za fiat.
greshamsLaw.title: Etteeka lya Gresham

answers: Etteeka erikubaganya ebirowoozo ku kiyinza okubaawo singa abantu ne bizinensi bagaana okukkiriza oba okukozesa ssente ez‚Äôomutindo ogwa wansi
Etteeka erigamba nti abantu bulijjo bajja kulonda ssente ezisinga okuba ez‚Äôomuwendo nga baweereddwa eky‚Äôokulonda

feedback: Kituufu! Omulimu mulungi, wategedde Etteeka lya Thier. Etteeka lino lyogera ku kiyinza okubaawo singa abantu ne bizinensi bagaana okukkiriza ssente ez‚Äôomutindo ogwa wansi. Ensonga eyeewuunyisa: Etteeka lya Thier liraga nti gavumenti bw‚Äôegezaako okukaka abantu okukozesa ssente ez‚Äôomutindo ogwa wansi ng‚Äôezifuula ez‚Äôomu mateeka, ejja kwewalikka
Eky‚Äôokuddamu ekikyamu! Etteeka lya Gresham lye linnyonnyola enneeyisa eno, so si Etteeka lya Thier
Bambi, gezaako nate! Etteeka lya Thier si lya kulonda bulijjo ssente ezitali za muwendo nnyo.
thiersLaw.question: Etteeka lya Thier kye ki
thiersLaw.text:
Etteeka lya Thier ndowooza eyogera ku kiki ekiyinza okubaawo singa abantu ne bizinensi bagaana okukkiriza oba okukozesa ssente ez‚Äôomutindo ogwa wansi.

Mu kifo ky‚Äôokubula mu kutambuza, engeri ya ssente ey‚Äôomutindo ogwa waggulu eyinza okusuubulibwa ku muwendo gwa waggulu, oba ku muwendo ogw‚Äôamaanyi okusinga omuwendo gwazo ogwa face.

Etteeka lya Thier ligamba nti gavumenti bw‚Äôegezaako okukaka abantu okukozesa ssente ez‚Äôomutindo ogwa wansi ng‚Äôezifuula ez‚Äôomu mateeka, ejja kusiwuuka empisa.

Mu ngeri endala, abantu ne abasuubuzi bayinza okusalawo obutakkiriza ssente za mutindo gwa wansi ate mu kifo ky‚Äôekyo ne baagala okukozesa ez‚Äôomutindo ogwa waggulu emu oba engeri endala ez‚Äôokusasula.
thiersLaw.title: Etteeka lya Thier's

answers: Ekintu ekibaawo nga ssente empya ziyingiziddwa mu by‚Äôenfuna, ekivaako emiwendo egimu okulinnya okusinga emirala ne kivaako okugabanya obugagga mu ngeri etali ya bwenkanya.
Amaanyi ag‚Äôekyama agaleetera abantu okufuuka cantaloupes buli lwe balya ebibala ebisusse.
Enkola y‚Äôamazina erimu okwekulukuunya mu nneekulungirivu ng‚Äôokwata ekibinja kya cantaloupes.
feedback: Tukuyozaayoza, oli mutuufu! Cantillon Effect mazima ddala nkola eyinza okufuga engabanya y‚Äôobugagga mu by‚Äôenfuna. Omulimu omulungi

cantillonEffect.question: Cantillon Effect kye ki
cantillonEffect.text:
Cantillon Effect kintu ekibaawo nga ssente empya ziyingiziddwa mu by‚Äôenfuna.

Ssente empya bwe zigattibwako, zitera okusooka okugenda mu bantu oba bizinensi ezimu, era bano abasooka okuzifuna balina enkizo ku balala kubanga bafuna okukozesa ssente empya nga emiwendo teginnalinnya.

Kino kireetera ebbeeyi y‚Äôebintu n‚Äôobuweereza ebimu okulinnya okusinga ebirala, ekitegeeza nti abantu abasooka okufuna ssente empya ziganyulwa ate abazifuna oluvannyuma ne bazirika.

Obukosefu buno bwasooka kunnyonnyolwa omukugu mu by‚Äôenfuna Richard Cantillon mu nsonga ya ssente z‚Äôebintu, gamba nga zaabu ne ffeeza, naye esinga n‚Äôokukwatagana leero mu mulembe gwa ssente za fiat.

Gavumenti oba bbanka enkulu bw‚Äôetondawo ssente nnyingi empya eza fiat, kiyinza okuvaako emiwendo okweyongera n‚Äôokugabanya obugagga mu ngeri etali ya bwenkanya, kubanga abantu abamu ne bizinensi basobola okufuna ebbanja mu ngeri ennyangu ne baganyulwa mu bbeeyi y‚Äôeby‚Äôobugagga okulinnya.
cantillonEffect.title: Cantillon Effect

Ki kyaamu! Naye waakiri oba olowooza ku nsonga. Mpozzi gezaako okuddamu okussa essira ku mpuliziganya ku mulundi guno
Ha! Ovudde ku nnabisaaniiko. Mpozzi gezaako nate era essira lisse ku ndowooza y‚Äôokulonda okusookerwako mu butabeerawo mpuliziganya.
schellingPoint.question: Schelling point kye ki
schellingPoint.text:
Ensonga ya Schelling kye kigonjoola abantu kye batera okulonda mu butonde, nga tebawuliziganya na bannaabwe.

Kino kiyinza okubaawo mu mizannyo egy‚Äôobwegassi egy‚Äôabazannyi abangi, gy‚Äôolina okusuubira okusalawo kw‚Äôabalala. Bw‚Äôosalawo mu bukyamu, oyinza okwolekagana n‚Äôebivaamu oba okusubwa emiganyulo.

Empuliziganya ekola mu ngeri y'emu - eringa omuzannyo gw'obwegassi ogw'abazannyi abangi oguzannyibwa n'abalala mu mutimbagano gwe gumu. Tukozesa enkola ezituukiridde (nga email, olulimi olwogerwa, oba ssente) okuwuliziganya obulungi n‚Äôabantu bangi nga bwe kisoboka, nga tetulina kusika muguwa kutono nga bwe kisoboka. Kino kiyinza okuvaako okweyongera mu by‚Äôobusuubuzi, okuwanyisiganya okumanya, n‚Äôokuyiiya.

Mu nsi ya digito, abantu batera okulonda enkola y‚Äôemu (ensonga ya Schelling) nga bawanyisiganya omuwendo. Kino kiri bwe kityo kubanga basuubira nti n‚Äôabalala bajja kukironda.

Enkola efuuka ekifo kya Schelling y‚Äôeyo esinga okuwuliziganya obubonero bw‚Äôemiwendo, okusobozesa abeetabye mu katale okukwatagana ne bannaabwe.

Bitcoin ye nkola y'okuwanyisiganya omuwendo erimu ebirungi ebiwerako ku ssente ez'ennono (eziyitibwa "fiat"). Okugeza, erina omuwendo ogutakyukakyuka era okutwalira awamu omuwendo gwayo gweyongedde okumala ekiseera, ate ssente za fiat zitera okufiirwa omuwendo. Okugatta ku ekyo, omukutu gwa bitcoin tegulina lukusa, gwa nsi yonna, era teguzikirizibwa. Ensonga zino zonna zifuula bitcoin ekifo kya Schelling eky‚Äôobutonde ku ssente.

Ha! Ekyo si kituufu nnyo. Ssente ezisaasaanyizibwa mu kugula mmotoka empya kika kya nsaasaanya ekigere, si kintu kye kimu n‚Äôomuwendo gw‚Äôomukisa. Mpozzi ddamu ogezeeko olowooze ku ndowooza y‚Äôokusuubulagana mu kusalawo.
opportunityCost.question: Opportunity cost kye ki
opportunityCost.text:
Omuwendo Gw'omukisa y‚Äôendowooza nti bw‚Äôosalawo okukola ekintu kimu, tosobola kukola kintu kirala mu kifo ky‚Äôekyo. Mu ngeri endala, buli lw‚Äôosalawo ku by‚Äôensimbi, olina okusuubulagana n‚Äôenkola emu n‚Äôofuna endala.

Bitcoin esobola okukuyamba okusalawo obulungi ku by‚Äôensimbi mu bbanga eggwanvu kubanga ngeri nnungi ey‚Äôokutereka omuwendo (nga okukekkereza ssente). Kino kitegeeza nti bw‚Äôoba ‚Äã‚Äãosazeewo okuteeka ssente mu bitcoin, oyinza okulekawo okukozesa ssente ezo ku bintu ebirala oba emikisa. Naye bw‚Äôokwata ku bitcoin yo, erina obusobozi okweyongera mu muwendo okumala ekiseera.

Kino kikulu nnyo naddala mu kiseera kino kubanga enkola y'ensimbi ey'ennono (eyitibwa "fiat") si ngeri eyesigika ey'okukekkereza ssente - ekoleddwa mu ngeri ereetera omuwendo gwa ssente okukka oluvannyuma lw'ekiseera. Kale, kikulu okusalawo n‚Äôobwegendereza ku by‚Äôensimbi okusobola okukuuma obugagga bwo.
opportunityCost.title: Opportunity Cost

feedback: Tukuyozaayoza nnyo! Okifunye bulungi. Obadde okimanyi nti waliwo ebintu bingi ebiyinza okukwata ku biseera by‚Äôoyagala, gamba ng‚Äôobukuumi bw‚Äôomuntu, emiwendo gy‚Äôomusolo, eddembe ly‚Äôebintu, n‚Äôobusobozi bw‚Äôokutereka omuwendo mu ngeri eyesigika
Si kituufu! Okwettanira obudde kulina akakwate n‚Äôokusalawo, so si ssaawa entongole ey‚Äôolunaku. Mpozzi ddamu ogezeeko olowooze ku ngeri ekiseera ky‚Äôolongoosa gye kiyinza okukosaamu by‚Äôolonda
Ha! Okutambula mu biseera kukyali kwa ndowooza ya sayansi yokka, bambi. Mpozzi ddamu ogezeeko olowooze ku ngeri ekiseera ky‚Äôolongoosa gye kiyinza okukosaamu by‚Äôolonda.
timePreference.question: Obudde Obw'okwettanira kye ki
timePreference.text:
Okwettanira obudde y‚Äôendowooza nti obudde bw‚Äôolina okulinda ekintu okubaawo busobola okukosa by‚Äôosalawo.

Ng‚Äôekyokulabirako, singa otwala ebintu ebiriwo ng‚Äôebikulu okusinga ebiseera eby‚Äôomu maaso, oyinza okulonda ekintu ekikusanyusa amangu ddala.

Ku luuyi olulala, bw‚Äôoba ‚Äã‚Äãng‚Äôebiseera eby‚Äôomu maaso okitwala ng‚Äôekikulu ennyo, oyinza okuba omwetegefu okulinda ekiseera ekiwanvu ekintu ekirina omugaso omunene mu bbanga eggwanvu.

Waliwo ebintu bingi ebiyinza okukwata ku biseera by‚Äôoyagala, gamba ng‚Äôobukuumi bwo, emiwendo gy‚Äôomusolo, eddembe ly‚Äôebintu, n‚Äôobusobozi bw‚Äôokutereka omuwendo mu ngeri eyesigika.

"Obukaluba" bwa ssente (engeri gye zikwatamu omuwendo gwazo mu bbanga) nabwo kikulu kubanga busobola okukubiriza abantu okutereka, okuteekateeka, n'okuteeka ssente mu biseera eby'omu maaso. Kikulu okumanya nti okulonda obudde si kintu kikakafu - kiyinza okukyuka okusinziira ku bikusikiriza mu mbeera yo.
timePreference.title: Obudde Obw'okwettanira

answers: Nga kapito atuukiridde ku ssimu, Bitcoin ekyusa enzikiriziganya y‚Äôamawanga agalina obwetwaze okulungamya enkola y‚Äôensi yonna ey‚Äôensimbi ng‚Äôefuula okufuga kapito obutasoboka kussa mu nkola.
Olw‚Äôokuba ensaasana yayo takyukakyuka, okubeerawo kwa Bitcoin kyanguyiza amawanga agalina obwetwaze okuteekawo emiwendo gy‚Äôensimbi egy‚Äôenkalakkalira.
Gavumenti zigenda kuziyiza okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku nsonga za Mundell-Fleming Trilemma kubanga okwogera kwangu okusengejja okusinga okusasula ssente ezisala ensalo.
feedback: okukakaabiriza.
Mazima ddala omuwendo gwa bukadde 21 gusikiriza nnyo, naye okubeerawo kwa Bitcoin mu butuufu kyongera okukaluubiriza amawanga okuteekawo emiwendo gy‚Äôensimbi egy‚Äôenkalakkalira. Gezaako nate
Wadde ng‚Äôekyo kisoboka ddala ddala, ekyo si kye kisinga okuvaamu wano. Gezaako nate!
impossibleTrinity.question: Okubeerawo kwa Bitcoin kukosa kutya Mundell-Fleming-Trilemma?
impossibleTrinity.text:
Obusatu obutasoboka, era obumanyiddwa nga Mundell-Fleming Trilemma, ndowooza ennyonnyola okusuubulagana okuli mu kuteekawo enkola y‚Äôensi yonna ey‚Äôebyensimbi eri eggwanga eryefuga.

Egamba nti ensi esobola okulonda bbiri zokka ku ssatu zino wammanga: emiwendo gy‚Äôo kuwaanyisa egy‚Äôenkalakkalira, okutambula kwa kapito okw‚Äôeddembe, n‚Äôenkola y‚Äôensimbi eyetongodde.

Enkola zino essatu teziyinza kugobererwa mu kiseera kye kimu. Kino kiri bwe kityo kubanga entambula ya kapito w‚Äôeggwanga, oba entambula ya ssente okuyingira n‚Äôokufuluma eggwanga, esobola okukwatibwako omuwendo gw‚Äôensimbi zaayo n‚Äôenkola yaayo ey‚Äôebyensimbi, eteekawo amateeka ku ssente mmeka ezitambula.

Nga kapito agenda yeeyongera okutambula era ng‚Äôasobola okutambula mu ddembe okuyita ku nsalo, kizibu eggwanga okufuga n‚Äôokulungamya entambula ya kapito yaayo. Okulinnya kwa bitcoin, ssente za digito ezitaliiko nsalo era ezitakyuka mu muwendo, kuyinza okwongera okusomooza obusobozi bw‚Äôeggwanga okuteekawo enkola y‚Äôebyensimbi.
impossibleTrinity.title: Obusatu Obutasoboka

answers: Ekintu eky‚Äôokwongera okukozesa eky‚Äôobugagga olw‚Äôokukola obulungi okweyongera

feedback: Kituufu! Okoze bulungi, olina okutegeera okunywevu ku Jevons Paradox. Ensonga esanyusa: Ekintu kino kyatuumibwa erinnya lya William Stanley Jevons, omukugu mu by‚Äôenfuna Omuzungu eyasooka okukyogerako mu kyasa eky‚Äôekkumi n‚Äôomwenda, 19
Bambi, tewali kintu kiyitibwa kibala kya Jevons. Ojja kuba olina okunoonya eby‚Äôokweyimirizaawo awalala

Bambi, ekyo si kituufu nnyo. Jevons Paradox mu butuufu egamba nti okwongera ku bulungibwansi kiyinza okuvaako okweyongera kw‚Äôokukozesa, so si kukendeera kw‚Äôokwagala eky‚Äôobugagga. Naye, waakiri olowooza ku bizibu oba embeera mu ngeri ezitali zimu, mu kifo ky'okunywerera ku ndowooza emu!
jevonsParadox.question: Jevons Paradox y'eriwa
jevonsParadox.text:
Jevons Paradox kintu ekyewuunyisa ekibaawo singa tukozesa ebintu bingi, ne bwe tuba nga tubikozesa bulungi. Kino kibaawo kubanga okwongera okukola obulungi ebiseera ebisinga kireetera ssente okukendeera, ekiyinza okwongera okwetaaga ebyobugagga.

Ekyokulabirako ekimu ku bino kwe kukozesa amanda ng'ensibuko y'amasannyalaze. Ku nkomerero y'emyaka gya 1700, abantu baalowooza nti amanda gaali gaweddewo, naye ekyuma kya James Watt eky'omusenyu kyasobozesa okukozesa amanda mu ngeri ennungi. Kino kyaleetera abantu okweyongera okwetaaga amanda wadde nga gaali gakozesebwa bulungi. Enkolagana wakati w'amaanyi ne ssente nayo nkulu nnyo okulowoozaako.

Abantu abamu bategese okukozesa amaanyi ng'ekipimo ky'omugaso gwa ssente kyokka kino mu nkola tekifunye buwanguzi. Wabula Bitcoin ekozesa enkola eyitibwa 'proof of work', ekubiriza abantu okukozesa obulungi amasannyalaze okusobola okufuna empeera.

Wadde ng'abantu abamu bavumirira enkozesa y'amasannyalaze mu ngeri eno, kikulu nnyo okujjukira nti abantu buli kiseera bafuna engeri empya ez'okukolamu amasannyalaze, era tetusaanidde kulowooza nti amasannyalaze ga bulijjo oba matono.
jevonsParadox.title: Jevons Paradox

answers: Etteeka ly'obuyinza mu by'enfuna

feedback: Omulimo omulungi! Omusingi gwa Pareto, era ogumanyiddwa nga etteeka lya 80/20, tteeka ly'amaanyi erinnyonnyola engeri ekintu ekitono ennyo (ng'abalimi 20%) gye kiyinza okubaako kinene kye kikola (nga 80% ku katale).
Bambi, naye kirabika olina okusiimuula ku by‚Äôenfuna byo so si bukugu bwo mu kufumba. Omusingi gwa Pareto si kika kya pasta wadde nga kiyinza okuba engeri ewooma ey‚Äôokukijjukira

Ntya nti ogenda kuba olina okuteeka eby‚Äôokwoza engoye n‚Äôofaayo katono ku by‚Äôenfuna. Enkola ya Pareto si ngeri ya kuzinga ngoye, naye ngeri ya mugaso ey‚Äôokutegeera engeri enkyukakyuka entonotono mu kintu ekimu gye ziyinza okuvaamu enkyukakyuka ennene mu kirala.
powerLaws.question: Omusingi gwa Pareto, era ogumanyiddwa nga etteeka lya 80/20, ekyokulabirako kya...
powerLaws.text:
Amateeka g'amaanyi ge ngeri y'okutegeeramu engeri ebintu bibiri gye bikwataganamu. Ekintu ekimu bwe kikyuka, ekirala kikyuka mu ngeri ekwatagana n'enkyukakyuka esooka. Amateeka gasobola okulabika mu bintundu eby'enjawulo, gamba ng'olulimi, ebyobulamu n'obwengula. Enkyukakyuka entonotono mu kintu ekimu zitera okuleetawo enkyukakyuka ennene mu kintu ekirala.

Mu by'enfuna, amateeka gatera okulagibwa mu bifaananyi ebiraga ebifaananyi. Ekyokulabirako ekimu eky'etteeka ly'obuyinza y'omusingi gwa Pareto ogugamba nti ebivaamu nga 80% biva mu bintu 20% ebibaviirako. Mu katale, kino kiyinza okutegeeza nti abalimi 20% be bakola 80% ku katale.

Amateeka era gasobola okulabibwa mu bitundu ebirala ebya bitcoin, gamba ng'obungi bw'amasoboza g'amanyi oba obungi bwa waleti ezikwatibwaako kkampuni ez'enjawulo kye zitunda. Era bisobola okulabibwa mu ngeri bitcoin gy'esansanyizibwaamu mu ndagiriro ez'enjawulo.
powerLaws.title: Amateeka g'oBuyinza

feedback: Okifunye bulungi. Ensonga enkulu lwaki abantu batera okukkaanya ku kukozesa ekika kya ssente ekimu mu kitundu ekimu eri nti y‚Äôesinga amazzi era y‚Äôesinga okutereka omuwendo
Ntya nti oyinza okuba ng‚Äôotabula ssente n‚Äôakawoowo ka ice cream k‚Äôoyagala ennyo. Gezaako nate
Bambi, naye langi ya ssente si y‚Äôensonga esinga obukulu mu kusalawo ekika ky‚Äôolina okukozesa. Omukisa omulungi omulundi oguddako!
winnerTakeAll.question: Ensonga ki enkulu lwaki abantu batera okukkaanya ku kukozesa ekika kya ssente ekimu mu kitundu ekimu
winnerTakeAll.text:
Endowooza y'omuwanguzi-atwala-byonna ebivaamu kwe kuba ng'ekintu kimu kyokka oba obuweereza kye kisinga obulungi era nga buli omu ayagala okukikozesa. Kino kiyinza okubaawo mu butale ng'omuganyulo omutono guyinza okuvaako okufuna bizinensi zonna.

Ssente y'enkola nga eno, ng'ekika kya ssente kimu kyokka kye kikozesebwa mu kitundu ekimu kubanga kye kisinga okuba eky'omugaso ate nga kye kisinga okukozesa okutunda n'abantu abalala. Kino kibaawo kubanga abantu baagala okukozesa ssente ezigenda okubawa obukodyo obusinga n'okuba ab'omugaso mu mbeera ez'enjawulo.

Ssente nazo ngeri nnungi ey'okuterekamu omuwendo okumala ebbanga. Bwe kituuka ku nteekateeka z'ebyensimbi, abantu batera okukkiriziganya okukozesa ekika kya ssente ekimu kubanga kye kisinga okuba eky'amazzi, oba ekyangu okukozesa, era y'engeri esingayo obulungi ey'okuterekamu omuwendo.
winnerTakeAll.title: Omuwanguzi-Twala-Byonna Ebikosa

answers: Enzikiriza nti yuniti emu ey‚Äôekintu bulijjo y‚Äôomuwendo omutuufu ogw‚Äôokukozesa ng‚Äôogeraageranya n‚Äôebintu ebirala
Enzikiriza nti ekika ky‚Äôensimbi ekimu kisinga ebirala byonna
Enzikiriza nti yuniti zonna ez‚Äôekintu zirina okuba n‚Äôobunene bwe bumu
feedback: Yee! Unit bias kwe kukkiriza nti yuniti emu ey‚Äôekintu bulijjo y‚Äôomuwendo omutuufu ogw‚Äôokukozesa ng‚Äôogeraageranya n‚Äôebintu ebirala. Kyokka, kino si kituufu bulijjo era kiyinza okuviirako omuntu okukubaganya ebirowoozo mu ngeri enkyamu. Omulimu omulungi

Ntya nti obuzabuziddwa. Unit bias si kukkiriza nti ekika ky‚Äôensimbi ekimu kisinga ebirala byonna. Mpozzi wandibadde onywerera ku kubala ssente zo mu kifo ky‚Äôokugezaako okuzuula omuwendo gw‚Äôensimbi
Bambi, naye unit bias tekiri ku bunene bwa units. Tofaayo, wabula ‚Äì okyayinza okusanyuka n'obunene bwa yuniti ez‚Äôenjawulo ng‚Äôozannya n‚Äôebizimbe oba amatoffaali ga LEGO.
unitBias.question: Unit bias kye ki
unitBias.text:
Unit bias kika kya ndowooza ekitwala nti yuniti emu ey‚Äôekintu kye kigero ekituufu eky‚Äôokukozesa ng‚Äôokigeraageranya ku bintu ebirala.

Kino si kituufu bulijjo naddala bwe kituuka ku bitcoin. Okutegeera engeri bitcoin gy‚Äôegeraageranya n‚Äôamaduuka amalala ag‚Äôomuwendo, olina okutunuulira omuwendo gwonna ogwa bitcoin oguliwo n‚Äôomuwendo gwayo, so si bbeeyi ya yuniti emu yokka. Bitcoin ntono nnyo era esobola okugabanyizibwa mu bungi obutono ennyo, okutuuka ku bifo 8 ebya decimal. Kino kitegeeza nti osobola okugula ekitundu ekitono ennyo ku bitcoin bw‚Äôoba ‚Äã‚Äãoyagala.

Abantu oluusi balowooza nti cryptocurrencies endala za buseere okusinga bitcoin kubanga zigula ssente ntono buli unit, naye kino si kituufu bulijjo. Bitcoin kika kya ssente za digito eky‚Äôenjawulo kubanga ekoma mu bungi era tesobola kukolebwa mu bungi.

Kino kigifuula engeri ennungi ey‚Äôokutereka omuwendo kubanga omuwendo tegukendeera okumala ekiseera. Bw‚Äôotunuulira bitcoin mu ngeri eno, osobola okulaba nti kitundu kitono nnyo ku muwendo gwonna ogw‚Äôobugagga obutali bwa gavumenti mu nsi yonna.
unitBias.title: Unit Bias

Ekika ky‚Äôekintu abantu bye baagala ennyo nga balina ssente nnyingi ze basaasaanya
feedback: Kyeekyo! Ekintu kya Veblen kika kya kintu abantu kye baagala ennyo nga bbeeyi erinnye. Kino si kya bulijjo kubanga abantu abasinga baagala nnyo ebintu nga balina ssente nnyingi ze basaasaanya
Nsonyiwa naye ekintu ekya Veblen si kika kya mmere. Mpozzi wandibadde onywerera ku kulya emmere gy‚Äôoyagala mu kifo ky‚Äôokugezaako okutegeera eby‚Äôenfuna

Ntya nti obuzabuziddwa. Ekirungi kya Veblen si kika kya birungi abantu kye baagala ennyo nga balina ssente nnyingi ze basaasaanya. Mpozzi wandibadde ofaayo nnyo ku by‚Äôenfuna mu kifo ky‚Äôokusaasaanya ssente zo zokka!
veblenGood.question: Veblen good kye ki
veblenGood.text:
Ebintu bya Veblen bye bintu abantu bye baagala ennyo nga bbeeyi erinnye. Ebintu ebya bulijjo bye bintu abantu bye batera okwagala ennyo nga balina ssente nnyingi ze basaasaanya.

Ebintu bya Veblen si bya bulijjo kubanga abantu baagala nnyo ate nga bigula ssente nnyingi. Bino bitera okuba ebintu eby‚Äôebbeeyi ebizibu okufuna oba ebikolebwa mu bungi obutono. Kino kikolebwa okuzifuula ez‚Äôenjawulo oba ezitatera kulabika.

Abantu abamu bayinza okwagala okugula bitcoin kubanga kabonero ka kulabisibwa, naye ensonga enkulu lwaki abantu osanga bajja okwagala okugigula eri nti waliwo omuwendo gwayo omutono.

Abantu bangi bwe baagala okugula bitcoin, bbeeyi erinnya era nnyangu okukozesa. Bwe kiba kyangu okukozesa, abantu bangi baagala okukikozesa. Kino kireeta enzirukanya nga obwetaavu bwa bitcoin bweyongera, bbeeyi n‚Äôegenda waggulu, era n‚Äôefuuka nnyangu okukozesa.
veblenGood.title: Veblen Good

feedback: Eky‚Äôokuddamu ekituufu! Oli ku kkubo ettuufu. Emiwendo bwe giba simituufu, kiyinza okuvaako ssente okuteekebwa mu bintu ebitakola nnyo. Omulimu omulungi

Eky‚Äôokuddamu ekikyamu! Naye waakiri olowooza wabweru wa box. Mpozzi abagenyi be bafuga obubonero bw‚Äôebbeeyi okuva ku mmeeri yaabwe ey‚Äôomu bwengula... oba mpozzi nedda. Omukisa omulungi omulundi oguddako
Bambi, naye unicorns tezirina maanyi ga kufuga byanfuna. Wadde, kyandibadde kirungi nnyo singa bakikola. Omukisa omulungi omulundi oguddako.
malinvestment.question: Kiki ekisinga okuvaako enkola y‚Äôokusiga ensimbi mu ngeri embi
malinvestment.text:
Malinvestment y‚Äôemiwendo gy‚Äôebintu bwe giba tegituufu, ekivaako ssente okuteekebwa mu bintu ebitakola nnyo. Kino kibaawo kubanga kizibu okulagula ebiseera eby‚Äôomu maaso n‚Äôokusalawo obulungi ku ky‚Äôokukola ku ssente.

Akatale bwe katakola bulungi, kiba ng‚Äôokugezaako okukozesa kkampasi ng‚Äôate tokakasa gy‚Äôoli. Ekyokulabirako ku kino, kkampuni bwe zitasobola kusasula ssente ze zeewola ne zibeera nga zirina okwewola ssente endala okusobola okusigala nga zilamu. Kino kiringa okubeera kampuni ya "zombie".

Gavumenti bw‚Äôeba evunaanyizibwa ku kusalawo kuno, bayinza okukola ensobi kubanga tebalina ngeri nnungi gye bayinza kumanyamu nsimbi nnungi n‚Äôezitali. Kino kiyinza okuvaako ebintu ng‚Äôokuzimba oluguudo lwa metro nga temuli ggaali y‚Äôomukka emala oba okuzimba ebbibiro nga temuli layini za masannyalaze zimala.
malinvestment.title: Malinvestment

Eky‚Äôokuddamu ekikyamu! Wadde nga llama eyogera n‚Äôenkima esirifu biyinza okukola ssente ennyuvu, tebitegeeza kusasula kwa kweetoloola. Omukisa omulungi omulundi oguddako.
asymmetricPayoff.question: Kiki ekiyitibwa ensasula etali ya kigero mu mbeera y‚Äôokusala ku by‚Äôokusiga ensimbi
asymmetricPayoff.text:
Bwe tusalawo ku ky‚Äôokuteeka ssente zaffe, tugezaako okulagula ekiyinza okubaawo ne ssente mmeka ze tuyinza okukola oba okufiirwa. Oluusi, omuwendo gwa ssente ze tusobola okukola oba okufiirwa tegwenkana.

Okugeza, singa tussa ssente mu kintu ekirina omukisa omunene okutufunira ssente ennyingi, naye ng'omukisa mutono gwokka ogw'okufiirwa ssente entono, kino tuyinza okukiyita "asymmetric payoff." Kino kitegeeza nti ekiyinza okuddirira (obungi bwe tusobola okukola) bunene nnyo okusinga obuzibu obuyinza okubaawo (obungi bwe tusobola okufiirwa).

Ekyokulabirako ekimu ku kino ye bitcoin. Ebiyinza okuva mu Bitcoin bifaanagana n‚Äôenkola, ekitegeeza nti etuuka ku buwanguzi oba eremererwa. Singa efuna akatyabaga, akabi k‚Äôokufiirwa ssente kakendeera.

Wabula, okulinnya okuyinza okubaawo kusinga nnyo, nga akatale ka bitcoin omugatte akayinza okuweebwa endagiriro kalina obusobozi okubeera sitoowa enkulu ey‚Äôensi yonna ey‚Äôobugagga.

Asymmetric payoff, oba obutali busobozi obuvaamu, ebaawo yokka nga waliwo okutegeera okutali kwa bwenkanya oba amawulire agakwata ku kusiga. Singa buli omu ategeera bulungi bitcoin, yandibadde yakozesebwa dda nnyo ng‚Äôengeri y‚Äôensimbi.

Mu kiseera kino, si buli muntu nti amanyi obusobozi bwa bitcoin ng‚Äôenkola ya ssente ey‚Äôoku ntikko, kale obusobozi bwayo okweyongera mu muwendo businziira ku bwetaavu bwayo okweyongera awatali kwongera kusasaanya mu bungi.
asymmetricPayoff.title: Okusasula okutali kwa kigero

answers: Kiyamba okuzuula obukodyo obuyinza okukuza ku nkola ya bitcoin
